column3: VB JJ NN VB CC VB IN NNP IN DT NN IN NNP NNS
column4: ROOT dep amod nsubj cc conj case obl case det obl case compound nmod
column5: we be look to Moodle for a replacement to Blackboard Enterprise . in order for Moodle to be a viable replacement we need a way to bulk create and delete course base on CSV file . the bulk create course be handle by use of a 3rd party module ( uploadcourse.php create by Rory Allford ) . however once we import say 700 + course there be no way to they bulk remove they at the end of a semester ( remove 1 by 1 would be too time consume ) . we would really prefer that this functionality be include within Moodle   as rely on 3rd party module ( no matter how good they be )   inherit a risk if the module stop get update .

text: non-graded assignment and quiz appear in the gradebook and have Max Grade assign
column3: JJ NN CC NNS VBP IN DT NN CC VBP NNP NNP VBN
column4: ROOT amod nsubj cc conj case det obl cc conj compound nsubj ccomp
column5: non-graded assignment and quiz be get display in the gradebook   and they look like be include into aggregation in the cat & item interface   since they have Max Grade value set to 100 . other activity behave definitely . e.g . if Forum be not grade   it do not appear in the gradebook as a column . which for I be a expected behavior . 1 . add a assignment . set it to no Grade . column will still appear in the gradebook . now go to the cat & item interface . it will display Max Grade for that column to be 100 point . ( though it will not be actually include into the calculation ) 2 . add a assignment . set it to be grade on a scale ( scale be not include in aggregation for we ) . maximum Grade in the cat & item interface will display some number ( e.g . 3   if there be 3 item in a scale ) . it be confusing   since one would now expect that 3 to be calculate toward course category total . 3 . add a quiz   add some question   and make the quiz to be worth 0 point . maximum Grade in the cat & item interface will still be 10 point ( or 100 ) . interestingly enough   I can manually delete a gradebook column for this kind of quiz . ( but   once I delete a column   there be no way for I add it back   even though I will make the quiz gradable ) I think mdl - 14017 be relate to this .

column5: this issue be in reference to http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 111362 . in brief   one of we moodle extension would benefit greatly from be able to use Moodle s role and context system   and we would need to define we own context level . however   we would like to be able to do this without have to differ from core in unmaintainable way . we believe that this would be helpful to many other Moodle partner and plugin developer   and some of we propose change may help to improve the maintainability and readability of core moodle code .

text: default timezone be incorrect when not set in PHP configuration
column3: NN NN VBZ JJ WRB RB VBN IN NNP NN
column4: ROOT compound nsubj cop advmod advmod advcl case compound obl
column5: when date.timezone be not set in the PHP server configuration   Moodle set the base timezone to PHP s default which be Asia Jayapura . when you then set a timezone in the administration area   to say Australia Adelaide   the time be half a hour too fast . if the date.timezone be set in the PHP server configuration   this be not a issue . the problem seem to be that PHP be still think Asia Jayapura be the base timezone   which be GMT +9 hour . when Moodle store the timestamp   it subtract the 9 hour from the current time   store a UTC timestamp value . when Moodle then go to display a time ( i.e . assignment conditional access time )   it add +9.5 hour to the timestamp which give the incorrect time . when use server s local time   it work fine and there be no issue either . however   if Moodle be set to use server s local time   and then a user manually set they timezone   it be again incorrect . might be relate to mdl - 22625   but it seem a little different again .

text: form validation and error recovery
column3: NN NN CC NN NN
column4: ROOT compound compound cc conj
column5: a better mechanism need to be use to help user identify error in form submission . the text that appear on the page after a invalid submission be not easily find by screen reader user . there be several technique for improve error recovery in form . the basic premise be to 1 . either automatically set the focus to the error message ( usually use server - side validation ) or use aria attribute to notify the user of a error message ( usually use client - side validation ) 2 . provide enough detail in the error message so the user know what the error be 3 . provide link within the context of the error message to allow user to easily jump to the part of the form where error occur WebAIM s tutorial on Error Recovery in Forms http webaim.org technique formvalidation # error w3c technique for create a mechanism that allow user to jump to error http www.w3.org tr wcag20 - tech g139.html

column5: the table use to display the grade in the user report grade view be a complex data table and thus need to have header explicitly attach to the correct data cell . by complex datum table I mean it do not have a single set of header across either the row and or column . for WebAIM s example of a simple data table   view the scope attribute at http webaim.org technique table datum # header . for the correct way to implement complex datum table   view WebAIM s the header and id attribute at http webaim.org technique table datum # id

text: provide easier chat reading for screen reader user in accessible chat activity
column3: VB JJR NN NN IN NN NN NNS IN JJ NN NN
column4: ROOT amod compound obj case compound compound nmod case amod compound nmod
column5: while the accessible version of the chat activity be accessible   it could be more usable . the way to navigate the discussion be a bit cumbersome to listen to for screen reader user because of the use of definition list . it might be better to store the chat message in a table with three column . column one would be a header column and include the poster s name . column 2 would be the message . column 3 would be the time stamp . this would allow screen reader user to simply navigate up and down the second column and easily hear the most pertinent information - the person s name and they message . the current definition list   while semantically correct   be quite verbose and cumbersome to navigate for screen reader user .

column3: NNP NNP NNP VBD IN NN -LRB- -RRB- NN
column4: ROOT compound compound nsubj dep case obl punct punct
column5: the below issue include the resolution . it merely need to be mark as fix and merge in to the main development branch . the ipn.php script   that be a part of the Paypal enrolment method   make call to a function message_send that can cause the entire PayPal enrolment method to fail . the ipn script be call by PayPal when a payment have be process . Paypal call the script and pass various token regard the transaction . the ipn script : 1 ) open a handle for the paypal connection 2 ) evaluate the receive token and validate they 3 ) enrol a student accordingly 4 ) notify the student   instructor & admin via a call to message_send ( ) 5 ) close the connection from paypal various people have be report that they paypal enrolment work fine for a while   but they start get these IPN failure warning message from Paypal . in they IPN history in Paypal   they see a list of fail transaction where the server ( moodle ) response be a 404 . what be happen for these people   be the 4th step above be fail . the ipn script die as a product of message_send ( ) fail and the PHP server process would seem to time out and cause the web server to return a 404 to paypal . since step 3 have be complete   end user of moodle be get what they need from the plugin . however Paypal doesn t tolerate the 404 response for long and automatically disable IPN message after a while - cause paypal enrolment to fail entirely . the solution I be propose be really simple . I have modify ipn.php to use a wrapper function for message_send that put the call in try - catch block . this insulate the execution of ipn.php from whatever message_send failure ruin the whole experience . I believe resolve the issue in message_send be another matter ( and may merely be a misconfiguration thing - though myself and other do have system that send we email successfully   guess those situation aren t depend on the same function ) . I have attach my modify version of ipn.php below . I hope it be immediately merge in to the main development branch as this be probably affect even more people than have be complain about it . this issue have be observe by I personally across a wide range of 2.x moodle installation . I have avoid fix it myself and have just run on weekly build hope someone else would fix it . but push come to shove thus I fix it myself .

text: New message_send api be incapable of send notfication from the $ cfg - > noreplyaddress .

column5: the old email_to_user api could do this   and we need to be able to do this in many place in the code that currently use email_to_user   and which should be update to message_send in future . please extend the api to make this possible . the old system be able to set a fake name to go beside the $ cfg - > noreplyaddress   so for example you might get email from * shy user < noreply @ moodle.org > - for example when a forum poster have decide they want to keep they email private ; or * quiz system < noreply @ moodle.org > - for email generate in code . I think both these use - case be important   and so need to be implement in the api   but from what I can see   this will be hard because : * message can hang around for some time in the message_working table - that be   there be no guarantee that message be send synchronously - it be up to the message output plugin . * the from address in the message table be store as a userid in a not null default 0 column . note that this issue be different from mdl - 6796 .

column5: if a column be at the constrain limit like mdl_log - url   then if you replace it with a new url larger   that the search url will fail . { noformat } error writing to database more information about this error debug info : error : value too long for type character vary ( 100 ) update mdl_log set url = replace ( url   $ 1   $ 2 ) [ array ( 0 = > http localhost moodle   1 = > http localhost moodle21   ) ] stack trace : line 397 of lib dml moodle_database.php : dml_write_exception throw line 232 of lib dml pgsql_native_moodle_database.php : call to moodle_database - > query_end ( ) line 596 of lib dml pgsql_native_moodle_database.php : call to pgsql_native_moodle_database - > query_end ( ) line 6281 of lib adminlib.php : call to pgsql_native_moodle_database - > execute ( ) line 47 of admin replace.php : call to db_replace ( ) { noformat } Jason Ilicic and I have make some fix to the db_replace ( ) function to fix database issue when run it . - run the replace command on field that don t have the search url in it . -- in postgresql   update create another row and tag the old row be re-usable but effectively double the database size . - replace a url that be greater than original and make the column larger that DB constraint . -- if column be 100 char ( mdl_log - url ) and data be 100 char   a update will fail if replace url be greater that search url . - replace the search url if the column be equal or greater that the size of the search url .

text: additional name field   to allow asian language to flexibly display user name in chinese character   local phonetic system or romanization
column3: JJ NN NNS
column4: TO VB JJ NNS TO RB VB NN NNS IN JJ NNS
column5: JJ JJ NN CC NN
column6: ROOT amod compound nsubj punct mark amod obj mark advmod xcomp compound obj case amod nmod punct amod amod conj cc conj
column7: h3 . alternate name field * this be a proposal on behalf of the Moodle Association of Japan ( http moodlejapan.org ) . we be willing to work closely with Moodle HQ on this improvement and help by provide some funding for its development . * the standard Moodle have only two field for name firstname and lastname . in country that use a different writing system   this mean that two set of name need to be display   they name in the local writing system and they name in romanization . Moodle need a way to input both type of name   and for both the individual and the administrator ( and perhaps at the course level ) to determine which name appear in the various Moodle context . * a ideal configuration * I propose three additional field : * surnamephon givenphon alternatename * for standard english and european usage   these would be ignore   but for japanese   chinese   korean and perhaps other write system such as Thai   the various indian language and arabic . possible entry would look like this : | | | | lastname | | firstname | | lastphon | | firstphon | | alternate | | | Japanese | ‰ΩêËó§ | ÂÆè | „Çµ„Éà„Ç¶ | „Éí„É≠„Ç∑ | Satou Hiroshi | | korean | Êùé | Â•éÂ†± | Ïù¥ | Í∑úÎ≥¥ | Yi Gyubo | | Chinese | Èô≥ | ÁæéÂíå | „Ñî„Ñ£ | „Ñá„Ñü„Ñè„Ñ®„Ñö | Chen MeiHua | the site administrator would select how the $ fullname variable would appear . for japanese   for example   the administrator might select lastname + firstname + alternate so that the student name would appear in Kanji   but with the romanization of it follow the Kanji . this would allow everyone to know how the name should be pronounce . ( even japanese need this since there be alternate pronunciation for Kanji . Á•ûÈÉ® for example   could be read as Kamibe or Kambe depend on the preference of the user s family . ) any combination of the above could also be select as the default for user name that appear in various table . if the select field for table be one of the asian phonetic field   then rather than the standard alphabet display for filter the list by first name and last name   a similar selection display would appear for the select alphabetic system . for chinese   a selection would also need to be make for the phonetic system to use . Taiwan use the BoPoMoFo ( Zhuyin ) system   while mainland China use the Pinyin system . * Student ID Display * for many asian language   another problem not encounter so much in the West be people with identical name . this   plus the fact that some of the language ( namely japanese and chinese ) have no convenient method for order name in chinese character   mean that most school rely on the student id for order and identify student rather than ( or in addition to ) they name . thus   there should also be a option in the site set - up select the StudentID field to be display to the left of name on various listing such as the grade book   assignment evaluation   etc . * complexity & coding time : * this problem be quite complex since it involve modify core code in perhaps 50 - 100 file that do database I o   table display   preference selection   etc . and would need to be do in close coordination with Moodle Headquarters . * who would benefit from this improvement ? : * probably every institution in Asia that have staff who do not read the local language need to be able to display name in both the local language and roman letter . various   rather unsatisfactory ad hoc solution be currently use but a permanent   more elegant solution be urgently need .

text: replacement for the course and category management page
column3: NN IN DT NN CC NN NN NNS

column5: this issue have be create to look at a possible replacement for the course and category management page within Moodle . the management system we currently have be get pretty antiquated and could really do with a make over and could be greatly streamline to get all of the desire common feature onto fewer page . it would also be great if the process of add   move and delete category could be simplify and likely JS enhancement could help this ( think AJAX loading and drag + drop ) .

text: link to some 1.9 resource type break after upgrade to 2.2 follow by backup and restore
column3: NNS IN DT CD NN NNS VBP IN NN IN CD VBN IN NN CC VB
column4: ROOT nsubj case det nummod compound nmod case obl case nmod acl case obl cc conj
column5: step to reproduce : 1 . create a moodle 1.9 course with a resource of the follow type : url   text page   web page   or directory 2 . in a topic of the course ( or other wysiwyg - editable text in the course )   create a link to you resource 3 . upgrade you Moodle instance to Moodle 2.2 4 . at this point   you will find that the link still work . it will point to mod resource view.php but will redirect to the correct moodle 2.2 url such as mod page view.php 5 . create a backup file of the course 6 . restore the backup file into a new course result : the link in the restore course will not work . it will point to mod resource view.php   but now the page will show you the error message invalid course module id .

text: database function for fast bulk insert
column3: NN NN IN JJ NN NNS
column4: ROOT compound case amod compound nmod
column5: when insert a very large number of record   insert_record ( ) can be quite slow ( a few hundred ms per insert ) . I have do some testing and find that it be possible to get ~ 100x performance boost by bundle multiple insert into one query use the syntax : { { INSERT INTO table ( field1   field2   field3 ) value ( a1   a2   a3 )   ( b1   b2   b3 )   ( c1   c2   c3 )   ... } } I have write a generic function to do bulk insert : { quote } Insert multiple record into a table use batch insert syntax for speed } } @ param string $ table the database table to be insert into @ param iterator $ iterator a iterable object ( such as moodle_recordset or array ) contain object to be insert into $ table @ return true @ throw dml_exception if error public function insert_records_via_batch ( $ table   $ iterator ) { } { quote } the function build the query by add record from the iterator until it reach either the maximum query length or maximum record count ( both predefined constant )   then it do a insert and start build a fresh query . by accept a iterator you can pass in a whole array   or a recordset ( to avoid store all the datum to be insert in memory ) . although it work in simple case I be find that there be quite a few subtlety in the depths of dmllib and to make it work with all field type and database I think some core dml change might be need . I be wonder if there would be any interest in get this into core ?

I turn on the Debugger and find the follow script message ; -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- invalid json string fatal error : allow memory size of 100663296 byte exhaust ( try to allocate 85462399 byte ) in home souther9 public_html lib filelib.php on line 3066 -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- when I check the code it display the follow so I be not sure where to go to next ; _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ create curl instance $ curl = curl_init ( $ url ) ; $ option [ url ] = $ url ; $ this - > apply_opt ( $ curl   $ option ) ; if ( $ this - > cache & & $ ret = $ this - > cache - > get ( $ this - > option ) ) { return $ ret ; } else { $ ret = curl_exec ( $ curl ) ; if ( $ this - > cache ) { $ this - > cache - > set ( $ this - > option   $ ret ) ; } } $ this - > info = curl_getinfo ( $ curl ) ; $ this - > error = curl_error ( $ curl ) ; if ( $ this - > debug ) { echo < h1 > Return Data < h1 > ; var_dump ( $ ret ) ; echo < h1 > Info < h1 > ; var_dump ( $ this - > info ) ; echo < h1 > error < h1 > ; var_dump ( $ this - > error ) ; } curl_close ( $ curl ) ; if ( empty ( $ this - > error ) ) { return $ ret ; } else { return $ this - > error ; exception be not ajax friendly throw new moodle_exception ( $ this - > error   curl ) ; } } ___________________________________________________________________________________ can anyone help I get this sort out please I have try the forum and look through some of the other issue but to no help find . thanks Jim Kersting

column5: when I move the section in my course   they will sometimes reorder randomly . what I do : 1 . create a bunch of section ( I have 15 ) 2 . add content to some of the section 3 . add a section to the end use the plus icon 4 . try to drag and drop it to a location higher up on the page what I expect : the section to drop into the new location . what actually happen : the section drop into a random location and the other section reorder randomly as well . this happen about every 4th time I try to reorder a section .

text: assignment only partially disappear when teacher use role switch to Student submit assignment
column3: NN RB RB VBZ WRB NN VBG NN NN IN NNP VBZ NN
column4: ROOT nsubj advmod advmod advmod nsubj advcl compound obj case obl dep obj
column5: when use assignment : Advanced Uploading of file   I switch my role to student ( I have   normally   Course Creator and Teacher role ) . I submit a assignment as a test . I usually use a dedicated fake student account for this task   but do not at this point . I successfully upload a assignment in this state . because of the assignment setting   I ( as a student ) be not able to modify the assignment after it be send for mark . however   now all teacher see that there be 1 submit assignment yet my submission appear no where else . when click View 1 submit assignment   for instance   the list be empty . this be a minor inconvenience   and nothing more . I check and a regular student assignment submission appear as normal . * to test : * # create a assignment : Advanced Uploading of Files # switch role to Student . # submit some file and send for mark # return to normal role # click View 1 submit assignment . verify assignment do not appear .

text: allow the chooser dialogue to submit value for the radio button
column3: VB DT NN NN TO VB NNS IN DT NN NN
column4: ROOT det compound obj mark xcomp obj case det compound obl
column5: this doesn t affect the activity chooser   but can affect other . when submit the chooser dialogue   we disable a number of element to prevent duplicate submission . these include : * submit button * radio button browser don t submit the value of disabled element though   and as a result   the chooser doesn t actually offer its selection . since we ideally should disable the radio button   we need instead to create a new hidden field and set it be name and value to that of the radio button such that the value be send in the request . this doesn t affect the activity chooser as that chooser already override this default functionality to set a value custom to the intended target ( jumpurl ) .

text: develop course structure caching
column3: VB NN NN NN
column4: ROOT compound compound obj
column5: the main goal of this change be * to move the content of the field course.modinfo and course.sectioncache to MUC * . more complete list of change : - class course_modinfo   cm_info   section_cache no longer extend stdclass and all property be read - only . no more deprecated but still use everywhere public property - all property have getter and you can legally use either $ modinfo - > cm or $ modinfo - > get_cms ( ) - class cm_info and section_cache no longer calculate any datum on initialisation and only calculate it when it be need ( save extra db query when conditional availability be enable ) . - database field course.modinfo and course.sectioncache be remove   new application cache core coursemodinfo store this information . - course cache now additionally store some field from course table such as format   enableavailability   groupmode   etc . that be necessary when calculate availability or additional section field - new field course.cacherev add to table course and it be incremented every time the course cache be reset . object in cache store the value of cacherev at the moment when cache be build . this allow to avoid race condition when course cache be simultaneously reset and rebuild by different people and become corrupt . * main change for user * - less db query   less ram usage on heavy page such as my course - much less probability of corrupt course cache ( hopefully none at all ) - purge all cache purge course cache as well - every core upgrade purge course cache * note for developer * - do not access remove field course.modinfo and course.sectioncache - if you need the raw user - independed information - call get_fast_modinfo ( $ courseorid   -1 ) - do not try to overwrite append property of course_modinfo or cm_info - do not hint any of those class as stdclass in function argument or you will hit fatal error - enjoy IDE hint for the property and method in modinfo class - when call get_fast_modinfo ( ) for the list of course make sure to retrieve pass field cacherev . otherwise a extra db query will be make . not necessary when call get_fast_modinfo ( ) for current course . most of core api function return list of course will return you this field anyway .

text: assignment - teacher can no longer comment inline on online text
column3: NN HYPH NNS MD RB RB VB NN IN JJ NN
column4: ROOT compound punct nsubj aux advmod advmod obj case amod nmod
column5: in 1.9 there be a option comment inline which copy the student online text assignment into the feedback box   allow the teacher to comment directly onto they text - strike through   highlight in red   etc   in addition to feedback comment . see forum thread here : http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 207430 there doesn t seem a way to do this with the online text version of the new assignment module ( or if it be available   it be very difficult to find ! ) all reference to comment inline in the tracker and qa testing seem to interpret the term differently but I notice in one test mdlqa - 1872 Theresa Gibbison actually mention she do not see the student s submission in the box ; yet the test be pass . many teacher like the 1.9 comment inline facility as it help replicate mark in exercise book or on paper . how to reproduce : ( compare & contrast ) in 1.9 1 ) create a online text assignment and ensure comment inline be check 2 ) log in with a student account and type in some text 3 ) log back in with teacher account and verify that the student s text be include in you feedback box so you could if wish edit highlight they word in 2.3 : 1 ) create a new assignment 2 ) ensure online text be set to yes and feedback comment be set to yes 3 ) log in with student account and type some text 4 ) log back in as a teacher and verify the student text do not appear in feedback box ; therefore you can t scribble all over it like in exercise book : (

text: add a new health check to detect incorrect category path order and or miss parent category
column3: VBG DT JJ NN NN TO VB JJ NN NN NN CC CC VBG NN NNS
column4: ROOT det amod compound obj mark xcomp amod compound compound obj cc cc conj compound conj
column5: some site have corrupt hierarchy between course category   in course_categories - > parent field or in course_categories - > path . the cause of this issue be not present in the current maintain version and not all site be affect by it   so instead of add a upgrade process we add a extra health check process to explain to the user how to fix the problem   propose they a sql query to run into the database . * edit summary and description * -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- * original description * upgrade from moodle .2.1.1 to moodle .2.2.4 and then finally to Moodle 2.3.1 + ( build : 20120726 ) php php 5.3.2 - 1ubuntu4 .17 mysql 5.1.63 - 0ubuntu0.10.04.1 - log Ubuntu 10.04.4 LTS when I click on a course category it give I this error ( with full debug on ) : { noformat } notice : undefined index : 5 in var www moodle lib navigationlib.php on line 1796 notice : try to get property of non-object in var www moodle lib navigationlib.php on line 1797 notice : try to get property of non-object in var www moodle lib navigationlib.php on line 1801 coding error detect   it must be fix by a programmer : category path order be incorrect and or there be miss category debug info : Error code : codingerror stack trace : line 1809 of lib navigationlib.php : coding_exception throw line 1195 of lib navigationlib.php : call to global_navigation - > load_all_categories ( ) line 3039 of lib navigationlib.php : call to global_navigation - > initialise ( ) line 781 of lib pagelib.php : call to navbar - > has_items ( ) line 3 of theme aardvark_postit layout default.php : call to moodle_page - > has_navbar ( ) line 765 of lib outputrenderers.php : call to include ( ) line 712 of lib outputrenderers.php : call to core_renderer - > render_page_layout ( ) line ? of unknownfile : call to core_renderer - > header ( ) line 1445 of lib setuplib.php : call to call_user_func_array ( ) line ? of unknownfile : call to bootstrap_renderer - > __ call ( ) line 199 of course category.php : call to bootstrap_renderer - > header ( ) { noformat } as a admin I can go to the course category with no error . but when I be not log in   I can t. or other role . this fix script doesn t change anything : { code } < ? php require_once ( config.php ) ; echo start fix_course_sortorder ( ) ... ; fix_course_sortorder ( ) ; echo do ; { code } summary and description edit   original summary be : * category path order be incorrect and or there be miss category *

text: mssql backup fail under some circumstance
column3: NN NN VBZ IN DT NNS
column4: ROOT compound nsubj case det obl
column5: we encounter the problem when we automate backup weren t run properly ; they d get stuck part way through . try to backup the course the auto backup get stick at give we the same problem . certain big course ( in the sense of lot of resource   not filesize ) don t backup up properly either manually or through the automate system . the backup process just run until it get a fastcgi error . we try to see if we could narrow it down to particular type of resource   but that wasn t it . as a example   one course which wouldn t backup have a category level question bank with 1000 + question . I do a lot of unsuccessful troubleshooting   which I have not report -- here s where we be at now   hopefully it be useful to someone . please note that the change I detail below be not a fix   they be do for troubleshooting   use they in production introduce other problem : trace the backup process we find the problem would always occur in the backup_structure_dbops.class.php file in the function move_annotations_to_final ( $ backupid   $ itemname ) within the $ db - > set_field ( backup_ids_temp   itemname   $ itemname . final   array ( id = > $ annotation - > id ) ) ; call . add trace here show it tick along fine but then just stop . multiple attempt to backup the same course ( after wait for cron to clear out temp stuff ) end up fail at the same point . trace deeper into the set_field function   it call the sqlsrv do_query   to troubleshoot   I add a query timeout as follow ( none be specify originally ) in sqlsrv_native_moodle_database function do_query $ result = sqlsrv_query ( $ this - > sqlsrv   $ sql   array ( )   array ( querytimeout = > 10 ) ) ; the backup now return with error debug info : sqlstate : hyt00 < br > Error Code : 0 < br > message : [ Microsoft ] [ sql server native client 10.0 ] query timeout expire < br > update # mdl_backup_ids_temp set itemname = n filefinal where id = 1366 [ array ( 0 = > filefinal   1 = > 1366   ) ] stack trace : ‚Ä¢ line 397 of \ lib \ dml \ moodle_database.php : dml_write_exception throw ‚Ä¢ line 252 of \ lib \ dml \ sqlsrv_native_moodle_database.php : call to moodle_database - > query_end ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 370 of \ lib \ dml \ sqlsrv_native_moodle_database.php : call to sqlsrv_native_moodle_database - > query_end ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 1098 of \ lib \ dml \ sqlsrv_native_moodle_database.php : call to sqlsrv_native_moodle_database - > do_query ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 1475 of \ lib \ dml \ moodle_database.php : call to sqlsrv_native_moodle_database - > set_field_select ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 146 of \ backup \ util \ dbop \ backup_structure_dbops.class.php : call to moodle_database - > set_field ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 1338 of \ backup \ moodle2 \ backup_stepslib.php : call to backup_structure_dbops : : move_annotations_to_final ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 34 of \ backup \ util \ plan \ backup_execution_step.class.php : call to move_info ref_annotations_to_final - > define_execution ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 153 of \ backup \ util \ plan \ base_task.class.php : call to backup_execution_step - > execute ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 148 of \ backup \ util \ plan \ base_plan.class.php : call to base_task - > execute ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 105 of \ backup \ util \ plan \ backup_plan.class.php : call to base_plan - > execute ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 296 of \ backup \ controller \ backup_controller.class.php : call to backup_plan - > execute ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 111 of \ backup \ util \ ui \ backup_ui.class.php : call to backup_controller - > execute_plan ( ) ‚Ä¢ line 89 of \ backup \ backup.php : call to backup_ui - > execute ( ) vary the timeout have no effect ; it fail at the same place   just would take longer ... so add the timeout here get the backup process to fail after the timeout ( rather than wait for a fastcgi timeout ) . it look like mssql just not respond . I want to see what be happen with the table   which be hard for mssql and temp table   since they be session base . I don t have access to the moodle db session temp table from my db admin tool . to get around this   I modify \ backup \ util \ dbop \ backup_controller_dbops_class.php ( around line 141 & 150 )   so that a real table be create delete   instead of use MSSQLs session base temp table ( just remove _ temp _ in the call to dbman   ie $ dbman - > create_temp_table ( $ xmldb_table ) ; become $ dbman - > create_table ( $ xmldb_table ) ; and around 150 $ dbman - > drop_temp_table ( $ table ) ; become $ dbman - > drop_table ( $ table ) ; there be a similar fix neccessary in \ backup \ util \ dbop \ restore_controller_dbops_class.php   line 109   with this change   the backup and restore work ok . my hypothesis be that at some point during the long backup   another connection get make to mssql ; since temp table be associate with connection   the link to the original temp table get lose and the datum isn t available . of course this doesn t explain why the sqlsrv call ust time out rather than return a error . we have actually be use the system with this little change   but it be not really satisfactory -- the problem   of course   be that only one backup restore can be run on the system at any one time because there be just the one temp table ; and multiple backup just conflict   require the temp table we create to be drop . some related post http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 177822 ( I post this early ) possibly related http tracker.moodle.org browse mdl - 28162 other commenter on this issue be on MSSQL

text: META : collect together deprecate code change for Moodle 2.7
column3: NNP : VB RB VBN NN NNS IN NNP CD
column4: ROOT punct dep advmod amod compound obj case nmod nummod
column5: there be a number of part of the Moodle codebase that have be mark as deprecate as a warning to developer not to use these function as they will be remove in future . many have a deadline of 2.7 . each of these deprecate function   especially those in Moodle core code   should have a mdl issue associate with it . in order to time the removal of these deprecate function issue and not lose sight of they   this issue will be use to collect they together .

text: Gradebook Sum of grade show wrong total if item be hide
column3: NNP NNP IN NNS VBZ JJ NN IN NNS VBP VBN
column4: ROOT compound nsubj case nmod amod obj mark nsubj:pass aux:pass advcl
column5: when use the Sum of grade aggregation   if one of more item be hide the total show to student be no longer the correct Sum and appear to be the Mean of grade step to reproduce : make 4 assignment ( or just grade item )   set they max grade to 10   20   30 and 40 ( total = 100 to make it easy ) find a student and mark they for each so they score be 5 10   10 20   15 30   20 40 ( 50 % for all ) set the aggregation in grade to Sum of grade ( Extra credit and Aggregate only non-empty grade all unticked ) View user report and you will see a total of 50 100 for the student ( or login with the student account for the same view ) asmt1 5.00 0 - 10 asmt2 10.00 0 - 20 asmt3 15.00 0 - 30 asmt4 20.00 0 - 40 total 50.00 0 - 100 go to full view and hide assignment 4 ( I use with the eye in the action list but other method produce the same result ) go to Course grade setting   change hide total if they contain hidden item to show total exclude hidden item and change show hide item to do not show View user report the 3 remain item be 5   10   15 which total 30 however total show be now 37.5 100 asmt1 5.00 0 - 10 asmt2 10.00 0 - 20 asmt3 15.00 0 - 30 total 37.50 0 - 100 whichever item be hide the total be always 37.5 100   if 2 item be hide the total be 25 100 . expect that when a item be hide the Sum total should not include it so when item 4 be hide the total should be 60 and the student score 30 60 however the total remain at 100 . I have test this in 2.3   2.1 and 2.0 all do the same . I couldn t find anything similar in the tracker but find this which may be relate : http tracker.moodle.org browse mdl - 14831

text: gradebook table use complex table that be not accessible
column3: NN NN VBZ JJ NNS WDT VBP RB JJ
column4: ROOT compound nsubj amod obj nsubj cop advmod acl:relcl
column5: * issue * teacher : * Gradebook use complex table that be not accessible . * row header be incorrect so the user think they be in a different row than they actually be . student : * screen reader be incorrectly read the wrong row header datum because of the blank cell in the top left corner of the table . * Standard Level * wcag 2 1.3.1 ( a ) [ http www.w3.org tr understanding - wcag20 content-structure-separation-programmatic.html ] * impact * critical * example link * [ http demo.moodle.net ] * test step * # login as teacher # navigate to cf101 # click grade link # try to navigate the grade table . * Recommendations * * reduce complexity of grade editing table or provide a alternative   accessible interface . * correct the structure of this complex table to ensure the row header line up in the correct row . test with a variety of screen reader . explicitly set each table datum cell s row and column header . * edit 28 Aug 2014 : * unable to reproduce identify behaviour now that the UCLA code have be integrate . some improvement to accessibility have be implement under this issue   namely : * top left cell ( s ) have be replace with a single cell with rowspan that contain a label only visible to screen reader   namely { { get_string ( participant ) } } ; scope have be set to col to make it relate to the three or more column it sit above . * header attribute remove from * grade report cell * and * email cell * ; the only header for a row be the participant s name cell . this result in better behaviour ; when prompt about a give cell   a screen reader read first the column information ( category course   then activity title )   follow by row information ( user s name only )   follow by the contents of the cell . give that the float user panel only contain the user s name   this should be a acceptable tradeoff . note that a lot of element within these cell do not yet have they appropriate aria attribute ( e.g . the user picture ) ; this will be address in mdl - 46662 . * change   mostly to left cell generate by get_left_rows ( ) : * # top - left filler cell # * amend logic to generate a single big filler cell use { { rowspan } }   instead of multiple stack filler cell . # * set { { scope } } attribute to target column below . # * add a { { span } } to hold a label for say column   use lang string { { participant } } . # user row # * move { { header } } class onto first column # * add { { rowheader } } class to first column # * change all other column to be { { td } } s rather than { { th } } s so screen reader don t count they as row header # * hid user avatar from screen reader # activity header # * hid activity icon from screen reader

text: pre-cache active filter for course category to significantly reduce database query
column3: JJ JJ NNS IN NN NNS TO RB VB NN NNS
column4: ROOT amod amod nsubj case compound nmod mark advmod compound obj
column5: on Moodles that have a lot of course category   and a filter enable for content and heading ( e.g . multilang )   there be currently excessively many database query be make ( e.g . 1 per course category ) . for example   if you have 500 course category   which be often the case for large institution   you will have > 500 query on course index.php or course category.php . the database query be cause by a call to get the context instance for each course category . I have code something in the branch http github.com brki moodle tree mdl23 - preload - filter - for - course - category . the commit http github.com brki moodle commit da23cce06d7edbd2cad43ba9c25396dcf5bfac35 preload all the course category context instance for course index.php and course category.php . this reduce the database query significantly ( it make two database query to get all of the course category context instead of one for every course category ) .

text: extra credit box check when switch aggregation method
column3: JJ NN NNS VBD WRB VBG NN NNS
column4: ROOT amod compound nsubj advmod amod compound obj
column5: this be the same issue as mdl - 21449   which be close for inactivity . if you create the a grade category with the aggregation method simple weighted mean of grade and add item to it those item do not have the extra credit box check by default . however   if you change the aggregation method for a category to simple weighted mean of grade then all the item in that category will have the extra credit box check . step to reproduce : # create a gradebook category with the aggregation method weighted mean of grade . # add some item to the category   without the extra credit box check . # change the aggregation method on that category to simple weighted mean of grade .

column5: * issue * keyboard control - the content can be load   but it can not be start without use a mouse . keyboard control - the control can only be tab through if the mouse be use to show the control bar ( therefore   unusable with only the keyboard ) . keyboard trap - once the user tab inside the pane   there be no way get out of the player zone . focus order - focus can not be make into the player without first click into it with a mouse . * Standard Level * wcag 2 2.1.1 ( a ) [ ] wcag 2 2.1.2 ( a ) [ ] wcag 2 2.4.3 ( a ) [ ] * impact * critical * example link * [ http demo.moodle.net ] * test step * # login as a teacher # navigate to CF101 # create a file resource # upload a video # save and display # keyboard navigate to the video control .

Time - base media - there be no text alternative provide to describe the video . transcript - there be no descriptive text transcript provide for the content of the video . caption - there be no synchronize text caption provide for the content of the video . column5: add question through a quiz be log   but I find that the action of add a question to the question bank be not log . * replication step : * # log in as a teacher # navigate to a course # navigate to setting > course admin > question bank # create a new question # modify a exist question # navigate to Navigation > my course > CourseXXX > Reports > Logs ( or look in the log table in the db ) # click get these log _ expected result : _ question bank change should be show _ actual result : _ no entry for add modify question bank question be record full list of miss event in question bank : - create a question - update a question ( should also be trigger when question be move to a new category ) - delete a question - duplicate a question - update a question category ( should also be trigger when category be move to another parent ) - delete a question category - import question ( separate event be optional but still require question_created event for each individual question ) - Exporting question ( note : crud = r ) oddly there be one exist event \ core \ event \ question_category_created

text: move block on the course page be impossible with a keyboard
column3: VBG NNS IN DT NN NN VBZ JJ IN DT NN
column4: ROOT amod nsubj case det compound nmod cop case det obl
column5: * issue * keyboard access - a user be unable to move a block in the course page when editing be turn on only use the keyboard . the user have to clock on the block and drag it to its new location . * Standard Level * wcag 2 2.1.1 ( a ) [ http www.w3.org tr understanding - wcag20 keyboard-operation-keyboard-operable.html ] * impact * critical * example link * [ http demo.moodle.net ] * test step * # login as teacher # navigate to cf101 # turn edit on # try to move a block with only the keyboard .

text: add support for select gallery module
column3: VB NN IN VBN NN NNS
column4: ROOT obj case amod compound nmod
column5: we need to look at the best way of do this . from a quick play : * lib outputrequirements.php : : __ construct ( ) need to remove the gallery group if we be use the CDN * lib outputrequirements.php : : __ construct ( ) need to have the correct base for lib yuilib gallery * we need to include a specific snapshot of gallery in lib yuilib gallery - preferably the same version as define in lib yuilib 3.7.3 build loader loader.js * we need to drop $ galleryversion from yui_module ( ) and force people to use the gallery version that we ship which will be the same version as the loader define

text: prevent false - positive failure due to time difference
column3: VB JJ HYPH JJ NNS IN IN NN NNS
column4: ROOT amod punct amod obj case fixed compound obl
column5: some test fail if they happen to run when the second change over . this be annoying as it cause random failure . ( it might be difficult to fix in general   but one option be to make test allow a 1 second leeway   i.e . rather than do   assert that $ time1 == $ time2   do assert that $ time2 - $ time1 < 2 . ) there might already be a issue for this but in case not   I be file one to start the ball rolling . ( I do a search for the test_group_updated_event string and didn t find anything . ) { code } core_group_lib_testcase : : test_group_updated_event event legacy datum do not match expect value . fail assert that two object be equal . -- - expect + + + actual @ @ @ @ timecreate = > 1379077452 - timemodified = > 1379077452 + timemodified = > 1379077453 ) { code } and link from Dan ( inc this and other ) : http integration.moodle.org job 20 . % 20run % 20phpunit % 20unittests % 20 ( master ) 1668 testreport ( root ) core_setuplib_testcase test_localcachedir http integration.moodle.org job 20 . % 20run % 20phpunit % 20unittests % 20 ( master ) 1665 testreport junit ( root ) core_group_lib_testcase test_group_updated_event http integration.moodle.org job 20 . % 20run % 20phpunit % 20unittests % 20 ( master ) 1623 testreport junit ( root ) core_setuplib_testcase test_localcachedir http integration.moodle.org job 20 . % 20run % 20phpunit % 20unittests % 20 ( master ) 1605 testreport junit ( root ) core_completionlib_testcase test_update_state -- - original description completionlib_testcase : : test_update_state expectation fail for method name be equal to < string : internal_set_data > when invoke at sequence index 2 parameter 1 for invocation completion_info : : internal_set_data ( stdclass object ( ... )   stdclass object ( ... ) ) do not match expect value . fail assert that two object be equal . -- - expect + + + actual @ @ @ @ stdClass object ( completionstate = > 0 - timemodified = > 1352192574 + timemodified = > 1352192575 ) user Shared Jenkins Home git_repositories moodle_23_stable lib completionlib.php : 524 user Shared Jenkins Home git_repositories moodle_23_stable lib test completionlib_test . php : 162 user Shared Jenkins Home git_repositories moodle_23_stable lib phpunit class basic_testcase . php : 64

text: make the rubric advance grade criterion accessible to screen reader
column3: VB DT NNS VBD VBG NNS JJ TO VB NNS
column4: ROOT det nsubj ccomp amod obj amod mark advcl obj
column5: * issue * the table for criterion in both the create a advanced grading method and in the view of the advanced grading method when grade a assignment do not have table header or a table summary . a non sight user can t determine where they be in the table without header . * Standard Level * wcag 2 1.3.1 ( a ) [ http www.w3.org wai wcag20 quickref # qr - content - structure - separation - programmatic ] * impact * critical * example link * [ http demo.moodle.net ] * test step * # login as a teacher # navigate to CF101 # create and assignment and set the grading to mark guide or rubric # try to navigate through the criterion table use a screen reader . try to determine you position in the table .

column5: when a forum be create with auto subscription select   and a grouping choose   only those user that belong to the grouping should be subscribe . also   when force subscription be check   and a grouping be select   only those user belong to the group should be list as subscribe . currently   in both of those scenario all user in the course be subscribe . this have implication with the emailing of notification due to new forum post and whatnot . instead of only the grouping member receive the email all member receive it . * problem 1 : automatic subscription * prerequisite : a course with at least 1 grouping   contain at least 1 group   contain at least 1 user in the group   and at least 1 user not in the group . # add a new forum to the course with the follow setting . # # subscription mode : auto subscription . # # Group mode : separate group or visible group # # grouping : choose you grouping # look at the subscription list . expect : only member in the grouping will be in the subscriber list actual : all member in the course be in the subscriber list . * problem 2 : force subscription * prerequisite : user with valid email address you can check . valid email setting for Moodle . # add a new forum to the course with the follow setting . # # subscription mode : force subscription . # # Group mode : separate group or visible group # # grouping : choose you grouping # create a new post . # # mail now : check ( for convenience ) # wait for email to arrive . since forum do it be mail send use the CRON utility you may need to trigger a cron run ( < you moodle address > admin cron.php ) expect : only member of the grouping receive email actual : all member in the course receive email .

text: prevent inaccurate feedback notification where grade item hide
column3: VB JJ NN NNS WRB NN NN VBN
column4: ROOT amod compound obj advmod compound nsubj acl:relcl
column5: if the grade column for a mod_assign assignment be hide and a grader provide feedback   the student be send a message say something like [ teacher ] have post some feedback on you assignment submission for [ assignment name ] . you can see it append to you assignment submission . this be confuse for the student as they can t actually see it until the grader have make the grade column visible ( which   in we institution at least   can be well over a week after the feedback be give ) . to replicate issue : # create a assignment # set feedback comment and feedback file to yes # log in as a student and make a submission # log back in as a teacher and hide the gradebook item for the assignment # give feedback on the item # the student will get a notification message say [ teacher ] have post some feedback on you assignment submission for [ assignment name ] . you can see it append to you assignment submission . # log in as the student and follow the link in the email . you don t see the feedback .

text: assignment module should redirect after form submission
column3: NN NN MD VB IN NN NNS
column4: ROOT compound nsubj aux case compound obl
column5: after a student edit or save a submission the view submission page be render directly without a redirect . this allow the possibility of resubmit the form by use the browser refresh button or shortcut - key ( e.g.   f5 ) . it also leave the url in the address bar set to { wwwroot } mod assign view.php with no parameter which can cause confusion for user who bookmark the address   which when visit give a required_param miss error . redirect the user after form submission ensure that the form can not be resubmit with a browser refresh and ensure that the url be a valid url for bookmarking . it would be ideal if a grader be redirect after submit a grade for a student for the same reason list above .

column4: ROOT compound nsubj advmod compound obj
column5: m.core_dock . resizeblockspace ( ) in block dock.js expect all region id to be region - something   like region - pre in the theme base layout report.php   the region id be actually report - region - pre . so   when m.core_dock . resizeblockspace ( ) go to manage the side - pre-only class in the body tag   it actually start add remove report - region - pre-only class . this be due to the regex process the region id .

text: more webservice for assignment
column3: JJR NNS IN NN
column4: ROOT amod case nmod
column5: after a small bit of refactoring - most of the process_xxx function in mod assign locallib.php would be suitable for call from a webservice . list of simple function : | | function | | description | | Parameters | | return | | | mod_assign_revert_submissions_to_draft | revert a list of submission to draft for a single assignment | int assignmentid   array userid | array of external warning | | mod_assign_lock_submissions | lock a list of assignment submission for a single assignment | int assignmentid   array userid list of user id | array of external warning | | mod_assign_unlock_submissions | unlock a list of assignment submission for a single assignment | int assignmentid   array userid list of user id | array of external warning | | mod_assign_submit_for_grading | submit the current user submission for mark | int assignmentid | array of external warning | | mod_assign_save_user_extensions | grant extension due date to a list of student for a single assignment | int assignmentid   array userid   array duedate | array of external warning | | mod_assign_reveal_identities | reveal the identity for user in a blind mark assignment | int assignmentid | array of external warning | more complicated function : | | function | | description | | Parameters | | return | | | mod_assign_save_submission | save a submission to the assignment as the current user | int assignmentid   plugindata array of field use by plugin to save the submission . the valid list of field be dependent on the install plugin | array of external warning | | mod_assign_save_grade | save a grade to the assignment as the current user | int assignmentid   int userid   float grade   bool applytoall   plugindata array of field use by plugin to save the feedback . the valid list of field be dependent on the install plugin | array of external warning | other contender - download_all_submissions ( link to download a zip - tbd )

text: comment api doesn t store or validate component
column3: NNS NN JJ NN NN CC VB NN
column4: ROOT compound compound amod compound compound cc conj
column5: the comment db table doesn t have a component in it only a comment area : { code } moodle = # select * from m24_comments ; id | contextid | commentarea | itemid | content | format | userid | timecreate -- -- + -- -- -- -- -- - + -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- + -- -- -- -- + -- -- -- -- - + -- -- -- -- + -- -- -- -- + -- -- -- -- -- -- - 2 | 15 | page_comments | 0 | test | 0 | 2 | 1355903721 3 | 15 | page_comments | 0 | blah ! | 0 | 2 | 1355966525 4 | 34 | database_entry | 2 | test | 0 | 2 | 1355967009 ( 3 row ) { code } as far as I can see   there be no way to get from that commentarea back to a component   therefore there be no way to validate the permisison . see for example : { code } private function check_permissions ( ) { $ this - > postcap = has_capability ( moodle comment : post   $ this - > context ) ; $ this - > viewcap = has_capability ( moodle comment : view   $ this - > context ) ; if ( ! empty ( $ this - > plugintype ) ) { $ permission = plugin_callback ( $ this - > plugintype   $ this - > pluginname   comment   permission   array ( $ this - > comment_param )   array ( post = > false   view = > false ) ) ; $ this - > postcap = $ this - > postcap & & $ permission [ post ] ; $ this - > viewcap = $ this - > viewcap & & $ permission [ view ] ; } } { code } it look to I that this plugintype only come from the html and be not validate at all . so for example you could switch to the validation for a mod_assign comment to block_comment validation . you could probably also manipulate the html to view other people comment .

column10: I be the administrator of a Moodle site use Moodle 2.2.6 ( build : 20121112 ) . I would like to change the default setting for the follow user profile field to be as follow : email Display = 2 ( allow only other course member to see my email address ) email format = 1 ( pretty html format ) email digest type = 1 ( complete ( daily email with full post ) Forum auto - subscribe = 0 ( no : don t automatically subscribe I to forum ) Forum tracking = 1 ( yes : highlight new post for I ) when edit text = 1 ( Use HTML editor ( some browser only ) ) AJAX and Javascript = 1 ( yes : use advanced web feature ) screen reader = 0 ( no ) I see no reason why every moodle site admin would want the default setting to be as I have list above so I propose that a new page ( ? ) be create in the Site Administration area ( perhaps site administration > user > Accounts ) for site admin to set the default setting for these common field site - wide . obviously the default setting can be modify by user who have permission or when create new account . I find it a pain now to create new user account and have to have these field list in each upload . I read in discussion http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 33370 that I could change the setting in user editlib.php ( start at ~ line 143 ) . I would prefer not to modify core code on my site as it be difficult to maintain with each upgrade and I think this issue apply to other Moodle user . I have read in mdl - 32627   http tracker.moodle.org browse mdl - 32627 that the default set for AJAX be go to be as I d prefer it as soon as I move to moodle 2.3 . what about the other field though ?

column5: on upgrade from 1.9 to 2.x   filter that be no longer install available be not remove from $ cfg - > stringfilter config . additionally   when filter be uninstalled   they be not remove from $ cfg - > stringfilter config . they should be remove during upgrade and when filter be uninstalled . the additional filter in $ cfg - > stringfilter can cause $ cfg - > filterall to remain enable   which add db load to each page load to filter all string . there be no way to change it via the UI - a admin must manually remove the legacy filter from the string .

text: over-large backup fail transparently   then do not get delete next time   so space fill up
column3: JJ NNS VBP RB
column4: RB VBP RB VB VBN JJ NN
column5: RB NN VBZ RP
column6: ROOT amod nsubj advmod punct advmod aux advmod parataxis xcomp amod obl:tmod punct advmod nsubj parataxis compound:prt
column7: this refer to schedule backup   where the number of version keep be set to one . this customer site have about half a dozen very large course   where the backup system generate vary large file ( two example from the test I run this morning be 7.8 gb and 9.2 gb ) . these be obviously too large to be successfully zipped   and when the backup process they   it eventually fail with the error like : error - backup - moodle2 - course -1681-20130205-1034 . mbz do not appear to be a valid backup ( missing_moodle_backup_xml_file ) then ( in the log ) it say complete - next execution ( the next schedule backup time ) so it fail   presumably because it be too big - but then carry on . this in itself be good   as previously   failure like this be stop the backup schedule completely . however   the next time that the schedule course backup be run   all of the old version of the backup be replace ( remember   we be only keep one of each ) except the fail backup . Moodle do not seem to recognise they as valid backup   despite they filename   so they be not delete . over the course of several day   the multiple copy of large fail backup that result from this eventually fill up the server disk   and cause teh site to fail . I know that this relate to the larger subject of handle very large course backup   but can anything be do with the checking process   so that these large fail backup file do not get leave to fill up the server ?

column5: the upgrade script portion of the fix for mdl - 37939 be inefficient and cause a considerable performance problem for upgrade large site . the process query course module for each course section individually . that be a pretty big deal for Moodlerooms   where we largest site have nearly 445 000 course section   and a average of over 6 000 course section across 1 200 site . the root of the problem be find the course module which don t exist in the sequence field of the relate course section . the follow query will get those course section record for you . { code : sql } select c . * from mdl_course_sections c inner join mdl_course_modules cm ON ( cm.course = cs.course and cm.section = cs.id ) where concat (     cs.sequence     ) not like concat ( %     cm.id     % ) { code } the follow return a average of 33 course section for affect site ( ~ 80 % )   with a maximum of 772 course section . note : FIND_IN_SET be a operator that only work for mysql and pg   but the query can be tweak to support any rdbms . * additonally : * for 2.5 and 2.6 branch the new upgrade script have to be run again because of another bug . in version 2.4 we can just replace the old script with a faster one .

text: leave and right arrow for calendar not show up on android
column3: VBN CC JJ NNS IN NN RB VBG RP IN NN
column4: ROOT amod cc conj case nmod advmod dep compound:prt case obl
column5: the default leave and right triangle icon ( as use in the calender block to move to the previous or next month and as a seperator in the breadcrumb trail ) have issue on android . on android 4.0 up   the font be call Roboto . it seem to not have the left point version . I have not see it myself but I have have report that 2.3 device ( which use a font call Droid Sans ) be miss both version . here be a list of the geometric shape available in Unicode : http www.alanwood.net unicode geometric_shapes.html we currently use : 25ba black right - point pointer 25c4 black left - point pointer I believe these particular shape may have be originally choose to ensure they display on IE6 XP ( IE6 have issue where it didn t fall back if the first choose font didn t contain the character   proper browser continue to search through all you font ) . perhaps a different triangle shape could be use ? though testing that it work on everything else could be a pain . longer term these could be provide by a icon font or svg icon . I be mark this as RTL - relate as I assume the left face one be use more in those situation   and at least on android 4.0 that seem to be the main issue .

text: convert filepicker and filemanager to YUI module
column3: VB NNS CC NNS IN NNP NNS
column4: ROOT obj cc conj case compound obl
column5: these be a little broken   as discuss in mdl - 38515 . core_filepicker describe a file in repository filepicker.js which add a yui module call moodle - core_filepicker . because the YUI module be wrap in a YUI.add line   it be contents be only add to the sandbox when a module depend on moodle - core_filepicker . so in order to get this to work   core_filepicker depend on moodle - core_filepicker . the inclusion of core_filepicker mean that the JS file itself be include   and then the contents of it be YUI module be handle by we legacy code have it depend on it be own module . this be really really broken and need to be fix as it prevent we from detect and report other issue . my suggest fix be to go over the exist code and convert all of the bit to appropriate YUI module . this may give we a opportunity to write a treeview base on the new yui3 y.tree so we can remove the current dependence on yui2 here . my guess be that this could be a week or two s work .

text: lesson essay disappear if new attempt after exit
column3: NN NNS VBP IN JJ NN IN VBG
column4: ROOT compound nsubj advcl amod dep case nmod
column5: see this discussion : http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 225141 Diagnostic . - when a student exit a lesson before reach the last page   upon resume that lesson they be offer a choice : you have see more than one page of this lesson already . do you want to start at the last page you see ? unfortunately   in some case the system to goto last unseen page do not work as expect   which cause problem especially with Essays . due to the complicated nature of the lesson setting and flow   it be rather difficult to describe and reproduce the bug   but the patch I be attach seem to resolve the issue   after thorough testing . the bug concern all moodle 2 version . Patch test against current moodle 2.4 version only . Joseph

column5: while restore the Moodle feature demo course from the MOOCH hub to the latest 2.5 dev   the last page of the restore display the follow notice : { code } notice : undefined variable : sillybyrefvar in ... mod forum backup moodle2 restore_forum_stepslib.php on line 200 { code } this be a regression of mdl - 30102 that change the signature of the function : { code } - function forum_add_discussion ( $ discussion   $ mform = null   & $ message = null   $ userid = null ) { + function forum_add_discussion ( $ discussion   $ mform = null   $ unused = null   $ userid = null ) { { code } so that the third parameter be not pass by reference any more . as a consequence   the restore code : { code } $ sdid = forum_add_discussion ( $ sd   null   $ sillybyrefvar   $ this - > task - > get_userid ( ) ) ; { code } throw the notice as the $ sillybyrefvar be not set there .

text: code error the theme have already be set up for this page ready for output when add blog entry to a page resource
column3: VBG NN DT NN VBZ RB VBN VBN RP IN DT NN JJ IN NN WRB VBG NN NN IN DT NN NN
column4: ROOT amod det nsubj:pass aux advmod aux:pass dep compound:prt case det obl amod case obl advcl amod compound dep case det compound nmod
column5: when attempt to add a blog entry to a page resource   this code error result . { quote } code error detect   it must be fix by a programmer : the theme have already be set up for this page ready for output . therefore   you can no longer change the theme   or anything that might affect what the current theme be   for example   the course . more information about this error debug info : stack trace when the theme be set up : * line 640 of lib pagelib.php : call to moodle_page - > initialise_theme_and_output ( ) * line 769 of lib pagelib.php : call to moodle_page - > magic_get_theme ( ) * line 64 of filter mediaplugin filter.php : call to moodle_page - > get_renderer ( ) * line 157 of lib filterlib.php : call to filter_mediaplugin - > filter ( ) * line 209 of lib filterlib.php : call to filter_manager - > apply_filter_chain ( ) * line 329 of lib filterlib.php : call to filter_manager - > filter_string ( ) * line 1313 of lib weblib.php : call to performance_measuring_filter_manager - > filter_string ( ) * line 1075 of lib pagelib.php : call to format_string ( ) * line 926 of blog lib.php : call to moodle_page - > set_title ( ) * line 64 of blog edit.php : call to blog_get_headers ( ) error code : codingerror stack trace : line 1744 of lib pagelib.php : coding_exception throw line 872 of lib pagelib.php : call to moodle_page - > ensure_theme_not_set ( ) line 2782 of lib moodlelib.php : call to moodle_page - > set_course ( ) line 66 of blog edit.php : call to require_login ( ) { quote } Via trial and error when attempt to reproduce the error on a different moodle site   we find that it require a specific combination of filter . * step to reproduce : * # go to site admin > plugin > filter > manage filter . # make sure activity name auto - link be on and apply to content and heading   also that it be the first enable filter in the list . # make sure Multimedia plugin be on and apply to content and heading   also that it be the second enable filter in the list . # go to a course and add a page resource . # add the blog menu block to the page resource . # click add a entry about this page in the blog menu . # the above error be display . _ expected result : _ user should be able to add a blog entry without error . _ actual result : _ code error be display .

text: if Aggregate only non-empty grade be not select for grade category then total be display as dash instead of zero .
column3: IN NNP RB JJ NNS VBZ RB VBN IN NN NN RB JJ VBZ VBN IN NNS RB IN NNS .
column4: ROOT mark compound advmod amod nsubj:pass aux:pass advmod advcl case compound obl advmod advmod aux:pass case obl case fixed nmod punct
column5: Summary : when Aggregate only non-empty grade be not select for a gradebook category   accord to Moodle doc   that category total should display zero . however   the category total be show dash just as if Aggregate only non-empty grade be select . 1 . create a category   set to Weighted Mean of Grades   select Aggregate only non-empty grade . 2 . create two more category   set to Mean of grade   do not select Aggregate only non-empty grade . make these category a sub-category of the first category you create . 3 . create a couple of assignment for each of these sub-category . 4 . enroll a student and review the user report for this student . accord to the Moodle doc   the two subcategory create should be display a zero for the student category grade . however   only dash be appear . ( Moodle doc : ( http docs.moodle.org 23 en grade_categories # aggregate_only_non - empty_grades ) 5 . if you add grade for this student for any of the display assignment   then remove the grade   the category total will correctly display a zero ( or f ) . the Gradebook should be treat the empty grade item as zero and calculate the total with appropriate aggregation and display the proper total .

text: Block without header cause JS error on page
column3: NNP IN NN VBZ NNP NN IN NN
column4: ROOT nsubj case nmod compound obj case obl
column5: update description : reporter notice a Javascript error in some course page in edit mode . it cause activity chooser to fail to work . if block without heading be remove   JS code start work again so presumably presence of those block cause the error . -- -- - original description : thread here : http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 228086 # p997260 upgrade to 2.5 from 2.3 this week   initially use a incomplete zip file . subsequently correct . since then the activity chooser behave inconsistently in course . case 1 in some course it be grey out . switch it off allow the drop - down list to work - but only if you quickly select a option   otherwise it fail - jumpto.php appear to get a empty string in this case and also drag and drop of course item do not work . case 2 in some other course   use the activity chooser to select a activity or resource generate a error on selection of the activity or resource . switch off the activity chooser allow selection properly through the drop - down list . in these course drag and drop of item work as expect . we be use Moodle 2.5 + ( build : 20130524 ) on sql server 2008 ms sql 10.5.250 php 5.3.18 FreeTDS driver . upgrade error be report in mdl - 39869 ( closed ) .

text: epic : file api improvement to handle cluster environment
column3: JJ : NN NN NNS TO VB VBG NNS
column4: ROOT amod punct compound compound mark acl amod obj
column5: this have be talk about for many year but appear not to have a issue file for it . Moodle file currently go into dataroot directory on the server filesystem . this can cause problem when Moodle be use in server cluster environment where there may not even be local filesystem   when synchronisation be require across potentially many web server . this issue be the starting point for solve this problem . 1 ) collect solution idea hack from the community and discuss . 2 ) define a specification for core implementation in Moodle 3 ) Split into subtask under this issue . 4 ) complete the implementation .

text: hardcode timeout parameter in the repository plugin
column3: VBN NN NN IN DT NN NN
column4: ROOT amod compound case det compound nmod
column5: hi   I find hardcode timeout parameter in moodle repository lib.php this timeout result that I can t get a 25 mb video file from dropbox to Moodle . this be a blocker for the Dropbox plugin and for all other repository . the parameter should be configurable to higher value in config.php . if there be no setting in config.php then Moodle use the default timeout . the best thing would be if the Moodle admin can set the timeout in the repository setting moodle admin settings.php ? section = managerepositoriescommon best regards   Ralf moodleSCHULE - Moodle Partner { noformat } ** timeout in seconds for download the external file into moodle * const getfile_timeout = 30 ; ** Timeout in seconds for syncronise the external file size * const syncfile_timeout = 1 ; ** Timeout in seconds for download a image file from external repository during syncronisation * const syncimage_timeout = 3 ; { noformat }

text: activity chooser should better support subtype
column3: NN NN MD RBR VB NNS
column4: ROOT compound nsubj aux advmod obj
column5: in general we be try to remove the need for activity module subtype ( which explain why they look so bad on activity chooser in 2.3 + ) . however sometimes they be useful   especially for the case of lti subtype - external tool . after some discussion   the plan be this : 1 ) if a activity module just have one subtype   then promote the link for that subtype to look like a full activity . this simplify the interface for user . 2 ) if a activity module have two or more subtype   then promote the module in the UI to a group equal to activity or resource . for LTI this would be external tool and will show all the subtype icon link under it .

column5: if user be enrol in course from other host ( host 2 ) by mnet   and block course be activate in actual host ( host 1 )   error show : can not find datum record in database table course . * step to reproduce : * # Enrol user ( user a ) in course from other host ( host 2 ) by mnet # activate block course in home of host 1 # Access with user a in host 1 error show : can not find datum record in database table course . this be because in file : { code : title = block course_list block_course_list.php   in function get_remote_courses ( ) } $ coursecontext = context_course : : instance ( $ course - > id ) ; { code } that be define in the file : { code : title = lib accesslib.php } ... if ( ! $ record = $ db - > get_record ( context   array ( contextlevel = > context_course   instanceid = > $ instanceid ) ) ) { if ( $ course = $ db - > get_record ( course   array ( id = > $ instanceid )   id   category   $ strictness ) ) { ... { code } but $ course - > id not in table course because it be a mnet course . I think solution be comment : { code : title = block course_list block_course_list.php   get_remote_courses ( ) } $ coursecontext = context_course : : instance ( $ course - > id ) ; { code }

text: Front Page Dropdown Arrow not function ( backport mdl - 38661 )
column3: NNP NNP NNP NNP RB VBG -LRB- NN NN HYPH CD -RRB-
column4: ROOT compound compound compound advmod dep punct compound dep punct nummod punct
column5: after upgrade   it seem we have two choice for the front page if we want a combo list of course : 1 . set maxcategorydepth to unlimited and the front page will show every category uncollapsed and therefore every course . 2 . set the maxcategorydepth to some number   and the ( un ) collapse arrow on the frontpage will not work for any category beyond the maxcategorydepth   make it impossible to go to any course below the maxcategorydepth without load new page . now from the maxcategorydepth option text : deeper level category will appear as link and user can expand they with AJAX request . this be * not * what happen . if you click on the arrow   nothing happen . if you click on the category name   it take you to a new page . now I be not a moodle user   but a moodle administrator . but from what people be tell I   this be not how moodle 2.4 function   so I be guess it be a regression . I be run 2.5.1 + ( build : 20130712 ) ( 2013051401.02 ) and this affect both the standard theme and the new clean theme .

column4: ROOT nummod nsubj case det nmod aux det amod obj case det obl amod
column5: the new one topic at a time set display the single topic with a variety of subtle html difference from when they be display all at the same time . the relevant difference for this bug be that the topic head be a h3.sectionname if display all on one page but a div.mdl - align.title when show one at a time . ( on the overview page it be a h3.section - title ) the div should at least be a head tag   I would have in general think it might be the same html throughout the different course display type mode .

text: retire MyMobile as a standard theme
column3: VB NNP IN DT JJ NN
column4: ROOT obj case det amod obl

column5: * issue * context change - when the user select a file in the filepicker the user be not inform that the file edit modal have open . Standard Level * wcag 2 3.3.2 ( a ) [ http www.w3.org wai wcag20 quickref # qr - minimize - error - cue ] * impact * Serious * example link * [ http demo.moodle.net mod assign view.php ? id = 1778 & action = editsubmission ] * test step * # login as a student # navigate to a course # click the assignment # click add ... # select recent file private file ( make sure to have a file within the repository ) # click on the file # notice nothing be announce to the screen reader when the file edit modal appear
