text: add Atto HTML editor to core ( the editor formally know as contenteditable )
column3: VB NNP NNP NN IN NN -LRB- DT NN RB VBN IN JJ -RRB-
column4: ROOT compound compound obj case obl punct det nsubj advmod dep case advcl punct
column5: add contenteditable text editor to core ( non default ) . link to plugin db : http moodle.org plugin view.php ? plugin = editor_contenteditable link to github : http github.com damyon contenteditable also need : mdl - 40493 to allow user to set they choice of editor in they preference . reasoning : 1 . TinyMCE have bug in iOS that we have be unable to solve in a reasonable amount of time . this editor be much simpler - so less to debug maintain . we can leave tinymce as the default - but use this editor on iOS spcifically where tinyMCE fail . 2 . it fit with Moodle better - it use YUI for window management   and event handling - and use moodle pix_icons etc - so the UI fit better with Moodle . thing to do : change the name ? - do - rename to html5 text editor change the icon ? - only for consistency . can be do when icon be ready . if this be to be a core editor it need to support enough of the feature that TinyMCE support so that it be not see as worse . some thing tinyMCE do that contenteditable do not : * image alignment * maths plugin * color * Fonts * paste from word ( be this really need ? ) * more ...

column5: 1 module and block tell you when there be plugin that be not uninstalled properly   but other type of plugin do not we need to look for version in config_plguins table ... this create multiple problem because there be leftovers in multiple core table and admin can not easily force uninstall 2 plugin_manager class should be use strictly for management of plugin   for everything else it be huge   slow and often even incorrect because the get_plugins method return even uninstalled module and block . the solution be to use core_component which be extremely fast compare to plugin_manager abstraction . 3 another problem be that module and block store version info in special db table instead of standard config_plugins table . 4 review plugin_manager performance and caching

text: upgrading from 1.9 to 2.2 ( en - route to 2.4.5 ) have error with certain kind of url link
column3: NN IN CD IN CD -LRB- FW HYPH NN IN CD -RRB- VBZ NNS IN JJ NNS IN NN NN
column4: ROOT nsubj case nmod case obl punct compound punct dep case nmod punct obj case amod nmod case compound nmod
column5: we have a customer site run 1.9.19 . they have ( in most of they course ) a file link resource to a upload html file at the top of the course   a big file of instruction in many section   and then further down in each topic section they have a file website link resource to the same upload file   but specify a anchor in the file   so that the learner could click on this resource and be take to the relevant part of the big html file . so those resource all end with the same filename   like this : path to file instructions.html # 3 the # 3 ( or whatever number ) open the html file and scroll down to the relevant anchor . if you run a moodle upgrade on this site from 1.9 to 2.2 ( which * have * to be do before go to 2.4 ) then the main upload file link resource convert correctly   but the resource contain link to specific anchor in that html file start to convert as file link ( rather than website link ) and then fail   because the file instructions.html # 3 ( or whatever ) do not exist . this particular customer site end up with about 1400 broken resource   all of they of the above type - a link to a upload html file with the anchor number specify on the file link . I know that 1.9 and 2.2 be no longer officially report   but we   in common no doubt with a lot of partner   still have quite a number of 1.9 site to upgrade   and if we come across this kind of resource link again   and the conversion process do not handle the resource correctly we end up with potentially hundred or thousand of broken resource to fix . anyone get any idea on how to handle this kind of resource ? any chance of the upgrade code in 2.2 be alter to handle this ?

text: add mustache - power renderable for notification
column3: VB NN HYPH VBN NN IN NNS
column4: ROOT obl punct amod obj case nmod
column5: Grrrr take I 5 minute to track this down   theme_bootstrapbase_core_renderer : : notification doesn t apply any custom class . it look for just 4 class and disregard the rest . also it expect that $ class be a string which be not the case   it be valid to pass and array to class as well . { code } * * this render a notification message . * use bootstrap compatible html . * public function notification ( $ message   $ class = notifyproblem ) { $ message = clean_text ( $ message ) ; $ type = ; if ( $ class == notifyproblem ) { $ type = alert alert - error ; } if ( $ class == notifysuccess ) { $ type = alert alert - success ; } if ( $ class == notifymessage ) { $ type = alert alert - info ; } if ( $ class == redirectmessage ) { $ type = alert alert - block alert - info ; } return < div class =\ $ type \ > $ message < div > ; } { code } * edit 09 Aug 2014 * summarize this issue : * Sam initially discover the issue on 05 sep 13   wherein { { theme_bootstrapbase_core_renderer : : notification } } doesn t apply any custom class . * discussion take place and David sketch out a new notification api where rather than call { { notification } } with one or more class   notification should be emit by use one of { { alert_info } }   { { alert_success } }   { { alert_warning } }   { { alert_danger } } depend on severity level . * Jason review David s change . * Jetha discover Sam s initial issue in 2014 when try to add support for detailed notification ( e.g . CSV import stack trace )   and a discussion at HQ take place - the conclusion of which be that * while deprecate { { notification } } and its use in core be the right thing to do   the surface area to amend be too large to do in one issue * . this issue contain three thing : * fix the behaviour Sam initially identify   wherein { { theme_bootstrapbase_core_renderer : : notification } } doesn t apply any custom class ** this be achieve by remove { { theme_bootstrapbase_core_renderer : : notification } } entirely such that { { core_renderer : : notification } } can handle thing with the help of a new array in { { theme_bootstrapbase_core_renderer } } contain mapping between moodle and bootstrap css class . * integrate David s new notification api   but not yet deprecate { { notification } } ( which will be do in a separate issue   probably after the Gradebook 2014 push ) . * add support for a optional { { detail } } parameter on both old and new notification api for more detailed message . * edit 18 Mar 2015 * this issue be now simply about : * add support for add additional class to a notification beyond simply notifyxxx * create renderable * render notification with Mustache   see mdl - 49152

column5: the follow method of class cm_info be public before Moodle 2.6 . they be change to private in Moodle 2.6 but still can be access publicly via magic __ call ( ) method . they have to display deprecation message if access from outside of the class in 2.7 and in 2.8 the array $ standardmethods and function __ call ( ) need to be completely remove . function be still use as getter method for the correspond property { code } ** * list of method with no argument that be public prior to Moodle 2.6 . * * they can still be access publicly via magic __ call ( ) function with no warning * but be not list in the class method list . * for the consistency of the code it be better to use correspond property . * * these method be deprecate completely in later version . * * @ var array $ standardmethods * private static $ standardmethods = array ( follow method be not recommend to use because there have associate read - only property . get_url   get_content   get_extra_classes   get_on_click   get_custom_data   get_after_link   get_after_edit_icons   Method obtain_dynamic_data ( ) should not be call from outside of this class but it be public before Moodle 2.6 . obtain_dynamic_data   ) ; { code }

column5: currently unit test require access to external server . unit test can fail when you don t have sufficient access to the internet or when certain service be down . if tinyurl or download.moodle.org be not operate correctly then unit test fail . this be not always the desire behaviour for other complete unit testing . so we want to add a option to exclude test from be execute when they be remote . by default we will continue with the current external run to ensure we don t change the current expected behaviour .

text: serious performance regression in course reset of group   include race condition that may send erroneous email to student
column3: JJ NN NN RB RB NN IN NNS
column4: VBG NN NN WDT MD VB JJ NNS IN NNS
column5: ROOT amod compound advmod fixed dep case nmod punct case compound nmod nsubj aux acl:relcl amod obj case obl
column6: step to reproduce # create a large course   say with 10 000 user   a few dozen group each with a few thousand member   and several quiz . ( the OU have course this big . ) # time do a course reset to remove all group member . ( also look at the db query count in the footer . ) do this for moodle version both before and after mdl - 39958 be integrate . ( note that mdl - 39958 be commit with mdl - 39959 be the issue id in the commit comment . ) that be the perofrmance problem . now the nasty race condition . # work out which order $ db - > get_recordset ( group   array ( courseid = > $ courseid ) ) ; in groups_delete_group_members   in particular identify which goup will be delete first   and which last . # for one quiz   set Time limit as follow : # * Quiz close : now + 1 day # * quiz close group override for last group to be process : now - 1 day # * quiz close group override for first group to be process : now + 1 day # set the quiz to have attempt become overdue when time expire   and to send a email notification to student when this happen . # start a attempt as one student that be a member of both those group . answer some question but don t submit . # now   try to work out when cron will next run   and just beofre that   do a course reset to remove all the group member   now also need to be between t + 1 minute and t + 1 day . expected result : the student do not get a notification   because initially the close date be now + 1 day   and when they be remove from both group it be now + 1 day . possible result : Cron run between time the student be remove from the first group   and the time they be remove from the last group . hence cron see they as due to submit t - 1 day ago   and so make they attempt overdue   and send they a incorrect email .

text: grade lose when edit in the grader report due to max_input_vars
column3: NNS VBD WRB VBG IN DT NN NN IN IN NNS
column4: ROOT nsubj advmod advcl case det compound obl case fixed obl
column5: I have a number of manual grade item use to track offline assignment . recently I have find with the latest moodle version that the last 4 - 7 student in the grader report do not have they enter grade save . this seem to be something relate to sort - if I sort by they first name and enter the grade again   they be save properly . if I reverse sort last name   grade be save properly as well . Procedure : 1 . create a new manual grade item name pop quiz 1 - neural & hormonal lecture 2 . have a class of approximately 27 student . 3 . enter grade use the Grader Report with editing turn on . 4 . hit update . I have notice that this do not happen when AJAX grading be turn on & work ( i.e . the cell be change color ) . this happen both in Google Chrome ( with a variety of extension ) and Safari ( with no extension )   on a Mac run Mountain Lion .

text: Session cache stop work after upgrade to 2.5.2
column3: NNP NN VBZ VBG IN NN IN CD
column4: ROOT compound nsubj xcomp case obl case nmod
column5: finally we be able to reproduce the cache problem that be report in mdl - 41942 after the upgrade to 2.5.2 in datadir muc config.php the value { code } $ configuration [ store ] [ default_session ] [ feature ] = 6 ; { code } if you install the same version or just remove muc config.php and let it to re-generate the value become 14 . with this configuration and 2.5.2 code the session cache do not work at all - consecutive set ( ) and get ( ) inside the same request return false . to reproduce on dev site just edit datadir muc config.php and substitute feature value to 6 . imho there be two problem here : - config.php be not regenerate during upgrade - difference 8 mean IS_SEARCHABLE which should not affect function get ( ) anyway test script : { code } < ? php include config.php ; $ coursecatcache = cache : : make ( core   coursecat ) ; $ key = uniqid ( - randomkey - ) ; $ coursecatcache - > set ( $ key   test value ) ; $ value = $ coursecatcache - > get ( $ key ) ; echo core coursecat : ; echo ( $ value === false ) ? fail : ok ; $ cache = cache : : make_from_params ( cache_store : : MODE_SESSION   testing   sessioncachetest ) ; $ key = uniqid ( - randomkey - ) ; $ cache - > set ( $ key   test value ) ; $ value = $ cache - > get ( $ key ) ; echo ; test session cache : ; echo ( $ value === false ) ? fail : ok ; { code }

text: organize the registration of shutdown handler
column3: VB DT NN IN NN NNS
column4: ROOT det obj case compound nmod
column5: this issue arrive because   recently I have start to get some $ DB not available message when profile page   lead to the profiling run not send to db . and I be pretty sure that it have be work ok since 2.0   until we introduce the new session stuff that change the internal order of those handler . so please   avoid argue thing like it should not be use $ db and friend ( I be aware of they ) . it work and now it do not . let s try to improve the situation and the future . right now the registration of shutdown handler ( register_shutdown_function ) be completely chaotic and disorganized   and that can lead to more and more problem where some object   not available anymore   or dispose by a previous handler be need later in the chain of shutdown . { code } grep - lr register_shutdown_function * { code } so we need some method to organize and force they registration in a order way   declare they need ( db   log   whatever ) and observe any dependency between they and also   surely contain reference to all the need use to avoid its auto - disposal by php . not sure how to encapsulate all that information ( need   dependency   disposal ) nor how to behave ( multiple handler vs a big one in charge of everything ) . but it should be computable   I hope . Ciao : - )

column5: when the auto install add ons validation look for the lang en folder . if it do not find it   then validation fail and the plugin can not be install . depend on how the add on zip file be create however   there may be no folder entry in the zip file . just file with the full file path . most unzip app can handle both ok . to illustrate   the contents of the poodll filter which fail validation look a bit like this : poodll lang en filter_poodll.php poodll module.js poodll pix download.gif but the ensemble filter zip which pass validation look like this : ensemble lang ensemble lang en ensemble lang en filter_ensemble.php ensemble pix ensemble pix icon.png the code that do all this in : admin tool installaddon class validator.php and the area that need to be fix be in function : validate_language_pack

text: remove custom instance name from Cohort enrollment when cohort no longer exist cause code error
column3: VBG NN NN NN IN NNP NN WRB NNS RB RB VBP NNS VBG NN
column4: ROOT amod compound compound case compound nmod advmod nsubj advmod advmod acl:relcl compound amod obj
column5: when edit cohort sync enrollment in a course if the user remove the custom instance name for the instance and the cohort that the instance point to no longer exist   this cause the follow error on that course s enrollment method screen : notice : try to get property of non-object in opt rlcache www master enrol cohort lib.php on line 49 notice : try to get property of non-object in opt rlcache www master enrol cohort lib.php on line 49 coding error detect   it must be fix by a programmer : invalid context id specify context : : instance_by_id ( ) more information about this error debug info : Error code : codingerror stack trace : line 5221 of lib accesslib.php : coding_exception throw line 49 of enrol cohort lib.php : call to context : : instance_by_id ( ) line 165 of enrol instances.php : call to enrol_cohort_plugin - > get_instance_name ( ) this stop the user from be able to view edit enrollment method for a course and you have to re-add a name via database in order to get back to the enrollment method screen for that course . to replicate : create a cohort with member at system level add a cohort sync enrollment method to a course and give it a Custom Instance name and choose the cohort you just create . now go back to Site Admin - > user - > cohort and delete the cohort you create . go to the course where you add the cohort sync and edit the enrollment method and remove the Custom Instance name and save . I know this seem like a unique situation but I actually have this happen and have to really search for the answer as the error code do not really lead you to the name of the instance   as at first glance it lead you to believe it be a context issue .

I be redirect to admin index.php   where the miss plugin be also show but without uninstall option . so I have to go again to admin plugins.php and continue with the next one . just guess if it would be possible any of this : - add the uninstall option to admin index.php   or - after uninstall   get redirect to the page that ignite the uninstall ( admin plugins.php ) . Ciao : - )

column5: issue : enrollment duration be not apply when manually enrol a user if enrollment option be not expand . step to replicate : - go into a course - course Admin > Enrollment Methods > manual enrollment > setting - set and enable a default enrollment duration - go to enrol user - enroll user - just enrol a user result : no end date be apply to the user enrollment to get the user enrollment duration apply : - go to enrol user - click the Enrollment Options arrow to drop that menu down - make no change to it ( you will see the default be populate ) - Enrol user - finish enrol user - end date be populate

text: install add - ons cause 500 internal server error .
column3: VBG NN HYPH NN VBZ CD JJ NN NN .
column4: ROOT amod compound punct nsubj nummod amod compound obj punct
column5: when install add - ons use the functionality as describe on http docs.moodle.org 25 en admin tool installaddon index it be possible that when the file be copy from the moodledata folder to the moodle installation folder the wrong permission be use thus cause a 500 internal server error on a Unix Linux operate system when the plugin be use . if a plugin be unzip locally and ftp d then the issue do not occur . after extensive investigation ( and from other source ) on : http moodle.org mod forum discuss.php ? d = 238274 . I have discover that the folder be be copy with a 777 permission and the file 666 and that manually correct this recursively for folder to 755 and file to 644 rectify the issue . it might be that there be no actual code fix but rather improved instruction to set the permission on the moodledata folder as 755 for folder and 644 for file ensure the owner and group be the same as the web server .

text: Youtube Repository Video Preview be Cut Off
column3: NNP NNP NNP NNP VBZ NNP NNP
column4: ROOT compound compound compound nsubj cop compound
column5: when use Insert Moodle Media to add a Youtube video ( from the Youtube repository ) to a html editor   the preview of the video be cut off and display only as a very narrow vertical strip . please see the attach screenshot . note : this seem to be a problem only in the formal White   Boxie   and Brick theme . the follow theme display the video preview correctly : Anomaly   Arialist   Binarius   FormFactor   Fusion   Leatherbound and Magazine . step to replicate : # ensure YouTube repository be enable on site . # ensure the site theme ( or course theme ) be one of the affect theme . # Access the text editor in any course assignment   label   etc . # click Insert Moodle Media . # click find or upload a sound   video or applet ... # click on YouTube repository and search for literally any YouTube video . # select the desire video ; click select this file . # review the video in the Insert Moodle Media box . # for the affect theme   the video will be cut off and not display the entire video thumbnail . expected result : the full width of the video be viewable in the preview window . actual result : the video preview show only a very narrow vertical strip .

text: lesson module be not browseable use the server file repository
column3: NN NN VBZ RB JJ VBG DT NN NNS NN
column4: ROOT compound nsubj cop advmod dep det compound compound obj
column5: when file be add to a activity   a folder be automatically create in server file > > system > > course with the name of the activity and the type of activity . this folder contain all the file add to the activity . this doesn t happen when add file to a lesson activity . step to reproduce : create a new course . add a forum   database   quiz   and lesson activity . add image to each activity use the html editor ( i.e . insert edit a link   insert edit image ) . upload file from you local computer use the file picker . once all the activity be create and image have be add . edit the forum description . click on insert edit image > > find or upload and image . notice that the folder lesson do not appear in server file > > system > > course .

text: revisit CFG - > filelifetime implementation and use
column3: VB NNP HYPH SYM NN NN CC VBZ
column4: ROOT compound punct dep compound obj cc conj
column5: do some innocent testing of mdl - 38743 it be discover that CFG - > filelifetime be not use as often as desirable . see point b1 in that issue . this be about to consider how we could be use it better and apply that new approach everywhere . perhaps it may have sense to move it to within the sendfile function   so they continue accept arbitrary lifetime   but it CFG - > filelifetime be set   it take precedence . or perhaps it only take precedence if another setting say force ‚Ä¶ or only smaller accept if debugging be enable ‚Ä¶ the trick here be to decide the behavior that should help both site want to put a longer ttl and developer want to use small value for testing . while observe for it in as many place as possible ( if set ) . that be it   ciao : - )

text: New maintenance mode countdown count down to 0 instead of 1
column3: NNP NN NN NN VBZ RP IN CD RB IN CD
column4: ROOT compound compound compound nsubj compound:prt dep dep cc fixed conj
column5: if I enable the new maintenance mode countdown with sudo - u apache php admin cli maintenance.php -- enablelater = 2 there be a countdown messagebox at the top of every Moodle page until the maintenance mode be enable . unfortunately   the message in this message box count down to 0 instead of 1   so in the last minute before maintenance mode activation   there be a rather confusing message say site be switch to maintenance mode in 0 minute . I would like to propose to add 1 to the minute in lib outputrenderers.php   function maintenance_warning ( )   to solve this cosmetic issue .

text: Deprecate loginhttp
column3: NNP NNS
column4: ROOT compound
column5: in my opinion   it be about time we deprecate and remove the loginhttp config setting and seal this potential leak . it be remove from Mahara over three year ago ( http bugs.launchpad.net mahara + bug 646713 ) for two primary reason : * it break AJAX login ; and * there can be time where a http link be present on a https page . in moodle we don t have AJAX login   and we have mitigate against the https - > http issue by always set the wwwroot to the current schema . however   it would be really super nice if we * could * have AJAX login   and I don t feel that the reason which once prevent force use of HTTPS throughout a site be as strong as they use to be . hardware performance be far better than it be five year ago ; it be be [ prove how easy it be to steal session from non-ssl | http en.wikipedia.org wiki Firesheep ] so these thing be no longer theoretical or even hard ; and ssl be far more widespread . as it be   we already load all additional content ( e.g . css   JS   image ) over ssl so it be now just the actual page content which be not . we no longer have issue with third - party plugin not support ssl ( e.g . YouTube   Vimeo   etc ) . I would like to propose that we drop support for loginhttp . ( more documentation change : http docs.moodle.org 27 en Apache )

text: performance improvement to miss root directory upgrade step
column3: NN NN IN VBG NN NN NN NN
column4: ROOT compound case amod compound compound compound nmod
column5: in the update process for version 2013051402.10 there be a fix for miss root folder entry . ( file : lib db upgrade.php line 2216 ) to find the filearea where these entry be miss a left join be use . we have some installation with really large file table ( more then 600 mb ) . on these installation the update fail at this point . here be my attempt to get this work . maybe it help other people with the same problem . { code } if ( $ oldversion < 2013051402.10 ) { $ sql = select distinct f1.contextid   f1.component   f1.filearea   f1.itemid from { file } f1 where f1.component < > user or f1.filearea < > draft ; $ rs = $ db - > get_recordset_sql ( $ sql ) ; $ default = array ( filepath = >   filename = > .   userid = > $ user - > id   filesize = > 0   timecreate = > time ( )   timemodify = > time ( )   contenthash = > sha1 ( ) ) ; foreach ( $ rs as $ r ) { be there a root folder entry for that filearea ? $ count = $ db - > count_records ( file   array ( contextid = > $ r - > contextid   component = > $ r - > component   filearea = > $ r - > filearea   itemid = > $ r - > itemid   filename = > .   filepath = > ) ) ; if ( $ count ) { continue ; } there be no root folder entry for that filearea . $ pathhash = sha1 ( $ r - > contextid $ r - > component $ r - > filearea $ r - > itemid . . ) ; $ db - > insert_record ( file   ( array ) $ r + $ default + array ( pathnamehash = > $ pathhash ) ) ; } $ rs - > close ( ) ; Main savepoint reach . upgrade_main_savepoint ( true   2013051402.10 ) ; } { code }

column4: ROOT compound nsubj case compound nmod aux advmod punct mark compound nsubj:pass aux:pass advcl advmod
column5: we have a customer run on Moodle 2.5.2 . they be set up course use group enrolment key . I have check they configuration and it seem correct . if a user attempt to self - enrol on one of these course   use the correct group key   the receive the error incorrect enrolment key   please try again . but the key * be * correct . I have test this myself . the weird thing be that if you go into the group page   select the relevant group and choose edit group setting   then press save ( without change anything at all ) then the user can self - enrol . it be as if the group key detail have not be properly save the first time they be set up ... although the key have certainly be save   as you can click the unmask checkbox   and the correct key be display . the customer can t go through the whole site   hundred of course   editing and click save on every group in every course . I can not find anything wrong with the site configuration   the self - enrolment plugin configuration   or the group configuration . it seem to I that this be a bug   although I would be happy to be prove wrong as long as a explanation of this behaviour be forthcoming . I would appreciate someone take a look at this as a matter of urgency - I can arrange access to the site and server if require .

text: move ( non-js ) : title attribute be on wrong tag
column3: NN -LRB- NN -RRB- : NN NN VBZ IN JJ NN
column4: ROOT punct appos punct punct compound nsubj cop case amod parataxis
column5: when you be move item ( use the non-ajax version )   the move target be write out use code like the follow : { code } < li class = first movehere title = move aa306 discussion to this location > < a href = http learn2acct.open.ac.uk course mod.php ? movetosection = 149146 & sesskey = 666 > < img class = movetarget src = http learn2acct.open.ac.uk theme image.php ou core 1383320278 movehere title = move to here alt = move to here > < a > < li > { code } as you can see   there be a title attribute on the LI tag which do not make a lot of sense . it should be on the link tag . ( additionally   there be a unnecessary title attribute on the img tag . ) this be cause by mdl - 37085 . the previous code be : { code } < a title = move aa306 discussion to this location href = http learn2.open.ac.uk course mod.php ? moveto = 287791 & amp ; sesskey = 666 > < img class = movetarget src = http learn2.open.ac.uk theme image.php ou core 1382685195 movehere alt = move to here > < a > { code } this code be correct   with a title attribute on the a tag contain the full text   and a alt attribute ( no title ) on the IMG tag . for accessibility reason   none of these title be suitable anyway . all link should have different text so while the longer text include the name of the item be move   that doesn t actually help as it be still the same for all of they . a accessible solution would use text like : move item to Week 4 before study resource in other word   I didn t describe the item be move ( because they probably know   and it be the same for all of they ) but I include the section name of the target location and a relative before after for the position within that section . I be not sure whether or not it be worth do anything about this because I know Moodle HQ be plan to stop support the non-js graceful degradation feature . I be think about fix the regression and put it back to have the right attribute on the right tag   but since it be inaccessible even after do that ( and always be )   I don t think I be go to bother ... so probably just file this bug and leave it for Moodle staff to decide what to do   sorry ! the offend code where it put the title on the li be course renderer.php in course_section_cm_list   currently line 1097 1106   btw .

text: reimplement scroll lock for full - screen dialogue
column3: NN NN VBG IN JJ HYPH NN NNS
column4: ROOT compound acl case amod punct compound obl
column5: imo   this be a serious usability issue as many of we dialogue contain scrollable content . when these be open and you attempt to scroll   you will find that the page scroll too . whilst this isn t a major issue for desktop computer   those use trackpad ( predominantly laptop )   and those with touch screen ( predominantly tablet ) who swipe to get down the list will find that the whole page start to move once the bottom ( or top ) of the list be reach . in the case of the activity chooser   this be a serious regression . this patch re-introduce scroll locking but use a different method . rather than remove the scrollbar   we instead set the scrolltop and scrollleft to the position they be in when the dialogue be open . we do this on every scroll event . when the dialogue be close   we stop force the scroll and release control back to the user .

column5: when a assignment description contain a embed file or a link to a file and that assignment appear in the calendar block ( because it have a due date )   the embed file or link to a file break when that course be back up and restore to a new course . step to reproduce : # create a course . # add a assignment   add a file ( e.g.   a image ) to the description or create a link in the description to a exist resource ( e.g.   pdf document )   and set a due date for the assignment . # add the calendar block to the course . # backup the course and restore it elsewhere on the site ( be sure to include user datum ) . # enroll a user into the restore - to course . # as the enrol user   load the assignment in the restore course . the embed file or the link work . # still as the enrol user   go back to the course page and use the calendar block to click on the due date and then the assignment link . # the embed image or the link in the assignment description here be break . expected result : the file in the description should not be break . since the assignment description on the assignment page be correct   the calendar page should also be correct . actual result : the assignment page be correct but the calendar page have break link .

column5: it appear that since upgrade to 2.6   Moodle be send 2 set - cookie header with different value . while usually set multiple cookie with the same name would result in they be overwritten   there may be other issue cause by the bug . it be also create more work for Moodle in term of processing   database activity   etc   and should be resolve . a example of this be as follow ( request directly from Moodle.org   bypass all proxy ) : < http 1.1 200 ok < date : Thu   28 Nov 2013 04:27:15 GMT < server : Apache < Vary : front - end - http   accept - Encoding   user - Agent < Set - Cookie : MoodleSession = uv7qph9jtem8rsi6d790j7p3l4 ; path = ; secure < expire : Mon   20 Aug 1969 09:23:00 GMT < Cache - Control : no - store   no - cache   must - revalidate < pragma : no - cache < set - Cookie : MoodleSession = ogn0cv0atsfr9i27gtvc0bkkg7 ; path = ; secure < Content - Language : en < content - script - type : text javascript < content - style - type : text css < x-ua-compatible : IE = edge < cache - control : post-check = 0   pre-check = 0 < last - modify : Thu   28 Nov 2013 04:27:15 GMT < accept - range : none < x-frame-option : sameorigin < transfer - encoding : chunk < content - type : text html ; charset = utf - 8 this have be reproduce on all 2.6 site   in addition to local copy .

text: base event JSON encode decoding check will fail with whole float value .

column5: check be do to ensure that the other event field do not contain a object . if the other field contain a float which be a whole number ( e.g . 90 ) then the encode decoding will result in the number be return as a integer . when the comparison be do it will fail . solution : the comparison do not have to be so strict to catch if object be be pass . ! = will suffice . @ see lib class event base.php line 447

column5: introduce in 2.6   you be now able to manage the digest option for different forum within a course ( access via http YOURMOODLESITE mod forum index.php ? id = 2   where id be the course id . on change the digest set for a forum   a message be briefly display detail the change you have make ; this message   however   be not always correct . the message be correct when select default ( no digest )   however the other three choice will always display a message state that you have change you choice to complete post .

text: parent role only see course total and no longer individual grade
column3: NN NN RB VBZ NN NN CC RB RBR JJ NNS
column4: ROOT compound nsubj advmod dep obj cc advmod advmod amod conj
column5: in 2.5 and 2.6 it appear the parent role can only see the course total of they child when view they user report   whereas previously they could see each individual grade in a course . have a capability change ? step to reproduce : ( rather long unfortunately ) 1 . as a teacher   create two assignment in a course and then grade they for a specific student . 2 . verify you can see both grade separately for the student . 3 . create the parent role as in http docs.moodle.org 26 en parent_role 4 . add a user to the student you grade as a parent and add the mentee block to the front page . 5 . log in as the parent ; click the name of the student in the mentee block . 6 . from the student s profile   click the name of the course where the 2 assignment be . 7 . in Administration > Profile setting for ( student name ) click activity report and then Grade . 8 . the course total of both assignment be show but not each individual assignment .

column5: while test behat setting recently I be confuse by the setting and later even more when look at the code itself . here be my attempt to simplify all this : 1 always require 3 behat setting - $ cfg - > behat_wwwroot   $ cfg - > behat_dataroot and $ cfg - > behat_prefix 2 cleanup script init code 3 do not require $ cfg - > wwwroot and $ cfg - > dataroot on test site 4 remove switch completely - the most confusing part for I 5 print out behat_wwwwroot in init script so that you can test the test site manually

text: get_graders ( ) match potential grader from all group
column3: NNS -LRB- -RRB- VBZ JJ NNS IN DT NNS
column4: ROOT punct punct dep amod obj case det obl
column5: we have come to belief that the function that determine who should recieve a notification to grade a submission ( mod assign locallib.php : get_graders ( ) ) be too broad . when use a activity in separate group mode the function currently identify potential grader as user who hold the grader capability and be in any group with the submitter in the course . we believe that this may be a issue . we have spend a while talk about this and feel that the { { groups_get_all_groups ( ) } } function should also pass the activity s groupingid value so that   if a grouping have be select   the potential grader be restrict to user within the activity s grouping . this should be a case of simply change the line to { code } if ( $ group = groups_get_allgroups ( $ this - > get_course ( ) - > id   $ userid   $ this - > get_course_module ( ) - > groupingid ) { { code } like I say we have spend a while talk about this and we can t see the reason why this work the way it do   so we would also welcome someone explain why it be the way it be !

text: testing site be clean all test dataroot contents
column3: NN NNS VBP VBG DT NN NN NNS
column4: ROOT compound nsubj aux det compound compound obj
column5: edit pdf plugin be add file to dataroot filedir during the moodle installation process   the same follow by phpunit and behat . when phpunit and behat reset the dataroot we clean all the contents of filedir so the file be still in the database but not in dataroot   access the edit pdf admin setting page result in a fatal error when look for the file that be suppose to be there . the file create during the moodle installation should remain in the database after the reset . as a solution I propose to store a list of the dataroot file present after the installation   and avoid clean those file when reset the dataroot . add also 2.5 as affected branch as 3rd party plugin add file during the installation process be also affect .

column5: h3.description from MDLQA test . for this test you will at least one course with at least 1 grade item and at least 1 student . the student need to have a grade for the grade item . while not necessary it be recommend that you have two browser ( ie Firefox and Chrome ) so that you can be log in as a student and a teacher simultaneously ) # as a teacher view the grader report . check that the grade item ( s ) and the student s grade ( s ) be correct . make a note of the student s grade ( s ) . # as the student go into the course . under Course administration click on grade . you may need to select the user report from the navigation drop down . # verify that the student s grade ( s ) be report correctly . # select the overview report . check that the student s course grade be correct . # as the teacher click on grade under Course Administration . select the user report from the navigation drop down . # verify that the teacher can access any user user report via the second navigation drop down . # verify that there be a all user option in the user selection drop down . this should display all student user report on a single page .

column5: this problem be report by partner . the trouble be that for various reason the context path may be miss which result in invalid sql like path selector in get_child_contexts ( ) - we need to verify the path be valid before use it . the problem be that the get_child_contexts ( ) may be use when delete datum which result in deletion of all context in several exist site when use some add - ons ... short term solution : # print debugging message when get_child_contexts ( ) on context that do not have path or depth and return empty array # prevent delete of system context long term solution ( new issue to be create ) : * prevent delete of invalid context in UI * add CLI tool for diagnostic and rebuilding of context path * add more debugging notice to inform admin that there be something wrong with context * add more debugging info for admin that try to insert datum directly to database table without rebuild the context * maybe add workaround code for invalid context that try to lookup child use some other info

text: implement new natural weighting interface
column3: VB JJ JJ NN NN
column4: ROOT amod amod compound obj
column5: this feature be a improved way of setting and display weight for grade in a category . it be describe in detail in the specification : http docs.moodle.org dev natural_weighting this aggregation method will be able to combine many of the current aggregation method into one . if that be so then we can potentially remove quite a lot of code from the gradebook   improve speed and readability . however   to be safe   we plan to implement this in stage : stage 1 ) implement natural weighting as part of the Sum of Grades aggregation type   with admin setting that allow they to disable all other aggregation if they choose . ( Moodle 2.8 ) stage 2 ) once people have be use this for a while   explore the possibility of remove other aggregation code or make they into optional plugin . ( moodle 3.0 perhaps )

text: get_records * _ sql silently convert invalid limit param to integer

column5: the parameter for get_records be : { code } get_records ( $ table   array $ condition = null   $ sort =   $ field = *   $ limitfrom = 0   $ limitnum = 0 ) { code } the parameter for get_records_sql be : { code } get_records_sql ( $ sql   array $ params = null   $ limitfrom = 0   $ limitnum = 0 ) ; { code } note that if you be a silly developer like Dan   you might accidentally pass a sort to { { $ limitfrom } } . in that case   Moodle silently convert the string to a int without warn the developer . I propose to add a debugdeveloper warning for this .

text: Drop problematic global text caching
column3: NNP JJ JJ NN NN
column4: ROOT compound amod amod compound
column5: the trouble be that there be a bazillion of setting option condition that may affect text filter outcomes - it be technically not possible to do a high performance cache at this level . drop the global text caching will fix multitude of issue at the same time : * JS handle * use of page and output * use of any other global * easier resetting of local filter cache * etc . there be already static cache in most filter   which mean this should not cause perf regression on large site - they be suppose to turn off this ugly feature already ... the next step be to migrate individual filter cache to MUC ( unless the perf overhead of MUC

column5: the m.util.js_complete test introduce by mdl - 41030 use array.indexof . unfortunately IE8 and below do not support indexof . although we don t support ie8   we shouldn t break this badly . possible solution include : # return early if indexof do not exit on the array ; # switch to YUI s array function ; and # monkey patch indexof onto the array . since we don t support ie8   nor do we test it   I think we should just exit if the indexof function doesn t exist .

( see screenshot 1 ) 2 . the user report give the follow error message : a error occur during grade calculation : probably circular reference or broken calculation formula . ( see screenshot 2 ) 3 . the export to Excel spreadsheet function give the follow error message : a error occur during grade calculation : probably circular reference or broken calculation formula . ( see screenshot 3 ) 4 . there be no broken formula in the Gradebook UI   mean that there be no way to fix this error . step to reproduce : 1 . create a manual grade item in the Gradebook . 2 . enter a formula in the grade item   refer to another grade item   such as = sum ( [ [ x ] ]   [ [ y ] ] ) . 3 . then delete one of the grade item that be refer to in the aforementioned formula   e.g . delete the grade item refer to as x . 4 . examine the formula ; it should now have a # # token indicate that it be point to a non-existent grade item . 5 . edit the grade item and change the value of Grade type from value to none 6 . examine the gradebook - the item have now disappear from the GRADEBOOK GUI . 7 . examine the database ( if possible ) - the manual grade item still exist with gradetype = 0 and the gradebook error persist . it be now only possible to solve this problem directly in the database . cause : I have update this report after we it support be able to track down the source of the problem . this problem be cause by the behaviour under item 6 in step to reproduce above ; namely   set the grade type of a manual grade item to NONE remove it from the GRADEBOOK GUI . this have happen on two separate course which cause we major problem and it have take we 6 month to track it down .

text: require_course_login : incorrect variable assignment
column3: NNP : JJ JJ NN
column4: ROOT punct amod amod dep
column5: in function * require_course_login * ( lib moodlelib.php ) $ issite be never true if parameter $ courseorid be not a object . { code } $ issite = ( is_object ( $ courseorid ) and $ courseorid - > id == SITEID ) or ( ! is_object ( $ courseorid ) and $ courseorid == SITEID ) ; { code } be not work correctly because = have a higher precedence than and or in PHP . it should be : { code } $ issite = ( is_object ( $ courseorid ) & & $ courseorid - > id == SITEID ) | | ( ! is_object ( $ courseorid ) & & $ courseorid == SITEID ) ; { code }

text: clean up all the theme ship in 2.7 by remove some from core

column4: ROOT advmod det:predet det nsubj dep case obl case advcl obj case nmod
column5: Moodle 2.7 contain two base theme that developer be maintain : * base : the old deprecated base theme with minimal css to be functional . * bootstrapbase : the new responsive base theme with minimal css to be functional . as well as this theme that a lot of community theme use as a parent theme : * canvas : create by New School Learning but no longer maintain much none of the above theme be selectable for use as theme themselves . Moodle 2.7 will have two selectable theme base on bootstrapbase : * clean : as default   implement almost pure bootstrapbase and to provide a clonable example of a basic theme * more : to allow basic admin to make simple tweak to colour   image and css from UI without need to touch file . everything else should be remove and put into github.com as public project ( if anyone want to maintain they ) and moodle.org plugin for download : * afterburner * anomaly * arialist * binarius * boxxie * brick * formal_white * formfactor * fusion * leatherbound * magazine * nimble * nonzero * overlay * serenity * sky_high * splash * standard * standardold

text: implement a new equation editor for Atto
column3: VB DT JJ NN NN IN NNP
column4: ROOT det amod compound obj case nmod
column5: we have several source to choose from . the requirement of the equation editor seem to be : 1 work with exist equation create with dragmath etc . 2 provide tab with button for add common latex element ( see mathquill ) 3 provide live equation preview while edit the equation 4 show preview of equation in text editor ( even before content be save ) 5 allow access to the tex source of the equation 6 allow editing of a exist equation without download uploading file . this be tie to the choice for filter for render equation   because the filter should be responsible for display the equation in the live preview   and or the content editable region . there be a equation editor in the prototype.moodle.net site which use mathjax   but it do not give you a list of tab button for common function ( not a useful one anyway ) .

text: add a mathjax filter
column3: VB DT NN NN
column4: ROOT det compound obj
column5: a demo mathjax filter be add to the prototype.moodle.net text editor demo . this be a pretty good implementation   but there be 2 problem with it . 1 the full mathjax library be hundred of megabyte ( font ) - it be just too big to include the whole thing in Moodle . so - some font be strip etc to keep the size of that one down - and it be still over 30 mb . a alternative be to use the CDN mathjax library by default - and provide a method to download and install the full version into moodledata for people who require it ( firewall proxy etc ) . 2 it do thing properly ( moodley ) by wrap the mathjax library a yui module and include it from the footer . this mean that the loading of mathjax do not block the rest of the page display . the downside be that the alternative method of install mathjax be to link to it in additionalhtmlhead . this include mathjax earlier   so the equation on the page be render earlier - and some people prefer that option . maybe there be a alternative way of include it that will load it earlier . 3 however it be load link etc . in the forum sample I have see   it be link to from the head with almost a default configuration . this be a xss risk - the tex allow some token which can produce e.g . javascript after render . MathJax have a option specifically for disable those dangerous command and this need to be enable .

text: possible reflect XSS in editor and imagefile form field
column3: JJ VBD NNP IN NN CC NN VBP NNS
column4: ROOT nsubj nsubj case nmod cc conj ccomp obj
column5: we have the issue below report to we via a security review of Totara   and since it also affect moodle master I be report it here . I be reasonably sure that it be not exploitable   but I be not a security expert therefore I think I d better report it just in case . feel free to close as not a bug if that be the case . the report be as follow : it have be detect by exploit the parameter imagefile of the form locate in url [ SITEURL ] user edit.php ? id = 70 & course = 1 request : post [ SITEURL ] user edit.php payload : { code } id = 70 & course = 1 & sesskey = xnwotlwuu1 & _ qf __ user_edit_form = 1 & mform_isexpanded_id_moodle = 1 & mform_isexpanded_id_moodle_picture = 0 & mform_isexpanded_id_moodle_interests = 0 & firstname = Whitney & mform_isexpanded_id_moodle_optional = 0 & lastname = Eldridge & email = whitney.eldridge @ anaplan.com & interest [ othertag ] = 1234 & maildisplay = 2 & imagealt = 1234 & url = http 127.0.0.1 foo.html & imagefile = % 22 % 3e % 3cqss % 20 % 60 % 3b ! -- % 3d % 26 % 7b ( ) % 7d % 3e & mailformat = 1 & icq = 1234 & maildigest = 0 & skype = 1234 & autosubscribe = 1 & aim = 1234 & trackforums = 0 & yahoo = 1234 & htmleditor = 1 & msn = 1234 & city = San % 20francisco & idnumber = 1234 & institution = 1234 & timezone = 99 & department = 1234 & phone1 = 8000000000 & phone2 = 8000000000 & address = 123 main St. & submitbutton = update % 20profile { code } response : { code } d % 26 % 7b % 28 % 29 % 7d % 3e & subdirs = 0 & maxbytes = 1048576000 & areamaxbytes = - 1 & maxfile = 1 & ctx_id = 1 & course = 1 & sesskey = xnwotlwuu1 height = 160 width = 600 style = border : 1px solid # 000 > < object > < div > < noscript > < input value = > < qss ` ; ! -- = & { ( ) } > name = imagefile type = hidden > < input value = id = id_imagefile type = hidden > < div > < div > < div id = fitem_id_imagealt class = fitem fitem_ftext > < div class = fitemtitle > < label for = id_imagealt > picture description < label > < div > < div { code } there be a similar issue with the summary_editor [ itemid ] parameter of editor form element . the problem only occur in form where the submit value be be set as the initial value for the field when the form fail validation and be be redisplay . someone could potentially insert something malicious in the value field and have it execute when the page return . the reason we don t think this be exploitable be that it seem that the malicious code can only originate and execute on the same client . however we do note that the chrome xss - auditor block the code from execute because [ the script s ] source code be find within the request . we have a look to see where the problem be . it appear to be with the way the value for these form element be filter when server side validation of the form have fail . getcleantype be return cleanhtml and raw for the editor and filemanager element   respectively . clean_param with type param_cleanhtml be be apply to all three of the parameter for the editor   description_editor [ text ]   description_editor [ format ] and description_editor [ itemid ]   while the itemid and format parameter seem to only even contain integer . imagefile be be clean with type param_raw ( the default when no settype have be specify ) . this could be a problem with other form element type - any element where settype be not specify   or when a insufficient filter type be specify and the field be not clean in some other way before be send back to the client when there be a validation error .

text: Atto : input text should not have for parent the contenteditable tag
column3: NNP : NN NN MD RB VB IN NN DT JJ NN
column4: ROOT punct compound nsubj aux advmod parataxis case obl det amod dep
column5: input text should be wrap in a tag if some of the input content have for parent the contenteditable tag . * paste text should be encapsulate into a tag if it contain element for which the parent be the contenteditable tag . * same on key pressed . these point be for both * html * and * source * mode . h3.why do we need that if you trigger a action on a section which have contenteditable for parent tag   all other section that have contenteditable for parent tag will be impact ( if the action be deal with parent tag of course ) . it be not a behavior that a user will expect   and most contenteditable editor do wrap any input text into tag to avoid this issue . h4.example my first section < div > my second section < div > * my new section * { { = > if the user try to right align this section   as we apply the action on the parent tag   the first section will be impact too . it be not the expect user behavior . the user just want to apply the action on the new section . } } < div > my third section < div >

text: decide upon intend screen reader support
column3: VB IN VBN NN NN NN
column4: ROOT case amod compound compound obl
column5: each of the screen reader we have come across seem to do thing they way   and have differ level of support for : * different accessibility feature ; * browser ; and * operate system we need to determine which screen reader ( s ) we intend to make moodle work best with in order to choose the most optimal solution for these reader . we selection also have a big impact upon the amount of time it require to develop new functionality and change   and to test it . from the compatibility matrix I have create so far ( http goo.gl b4cvb5 )   there be approximately 30 combination of screen reader + browser + operating system available to user . h4 . consideration ideally   this should be as few combination as possible because as we add each combination   the complexity increase dramatically   as do the time require for development and testing . the ideal solution would be for a single   well document   well test   and widely available screenreader   but as http goo.gl b4cvb5 show   this will not be possible as no screen reader support both Windows   Macintosh   and Linux whilst provide support for multiple browser . whilst Mobile support would be desirable   I think initially we should focus on improve the support for desktop screen reader as a priority and look at add mobile combination later . h4 . Options Data suggest that the most widely use _ primary _ reader by far be * Jaws * [ 1 ] though it be usage have see rapid decline over the past few year . Jaws be follow in popularity by Windows - eye   and Apple s voiceover . ChromeVox be the only screen reader we have come across to support the same browser across multiple operating system which may also be a important consideration for some user . at present its market share be low ( 0.2 % [ 1 ] ) but it be new to the arena - from what I can tell it be only release in February 2012 [ 2 ] with the survey take place in May 2012 . NVDA   which come in at fourth place in the webaim survey be also a interesting option as it be the highest rank free solution for Windows   though it be only compatible with Windows and the Firefox + IE browser . h4 . recommendation to offer the most widespread selection it make sense to choose from the follow subset of screen reader . I have not   at this stage   comment on the ease of development for each screen reader at present   or it be comparative support for various accessiblity functionality . h5 . Jaws Pros : * high market penetration con : * cost to user * Windows only * internet explorer only h5 . NVDA Pros : * Free * mid-level market penetration con : * Windows only * Firefox and Internet Explorer only h5 . OS X VoiceOver Pros : * Free * support all browser test * also available on iOS Cons : * Mac OS only h5 . ChromeVox Pros : * Free * cross-operate system con : * Google Chrome only h4 . source : [ 1 ] http webaim.org project screenreadersurvey4 [ 2 ] http code.google.com p google - axs - chrome source browse trunk chromevox readme ? r = 143

text: use restore and w origin in log event
column3: VB VB CC NNS NN IN VBN NNS
column4: ROOT obj cc compound conj case amod obl
column5: h2 . current problem problem be that we can not just falsify log history by inject log record from the restore file   event must be always trigger and we need to know where be the course come from   that mean the restore process need to log everything that be happen during restore . * import ( === backup + restore ) of activity should not try to restore any log * restore from different site can not create log entry with non-existent user * duplication of course ( restore into new course ) may bork stats * statistics should probably ignore the event come from restore completely h2 . possible solution h3 . a use event 1 trigger \ core \ event \ restore_started and \ core \ event \ restore_finished event ( this might be useful in any case ) 2 log writer would watch for these and start add restore origin when write event to storage during the restore process h3 . B new $ page - > get_request_origin ( ) the idea be to have one method that tell you if you be do something from normal page   w   cli   restore . the restore code would use some private api to tell page that restore start end or it could even use 1   but that would require a new observer which do not seem optimal to I . at the same time we could add $ page - > get_request_ip ( ) . after a or b be implement we could filter out log come from the restore process in stats and other area where we want to ignore the event trigger during restore . the next step would be to optionally restore the original log data - we would need backup restore support in log store and new method in base event class which would have to be override by event that can recalculate the id .

text: Refactor Atto code
column3: NNP NNP NN
column4: ROOT compound compound
column5: I have put together a ( mostly ) work poc to restructure the atto code . at present   the code be base around a structure which must be aware of every editor on the page . we have to pass around a elementid   and each plugin add button to they own element   but with a single click handler . the code also do not meet the coding style guideline . imo   we need to refactor this to : * not pass around the elementid ; * comply with code style requirement ; * include api documentation to assist plugin developer ; * have one editor instance per editor ; * have instance of the plugin on each editor rather than globally . this will : * make we life far easier in the future to maintain because we will be reduce the code duplication ; * allow people to write plugin more easily and with much less code duplication ; * which will allow for a greater diversity of plugin in a shorter period ; * give better confidence from third - party developer write plugin for the new editor   and as a result the community as a whole ( just think how much we have complain about the TinyMCE plugin structure ) . personally   I feel that this need to be do before integration   and certainly before release . I have be work on a poc which be semi-functional ( 35 % of plugin be already do and the other aren t far off ) and it only take a few hour to write include appropriate api doc .

text: Atto : Toolbar should wrap on several line
column3: NNP : NNP MD VB IN JJ NNS
column4: ROOT punct nsubj aux parataxis case amod obl
column5: currently   when expand it   some button be open on the same line   some on the next one . this create a inconsistent visual experience on Desktop . the button should have a constant position so that it make it easy to find they   and see where they will appear when expand collapse . Damyon : I think this be not a blocker ( it could be a improvement   but to decide on the best functionality   be difficult as there will be differ opinion . I agree that a consistent order make thing easier to learn ( so they can be repeat quickly ) . this will be improve by have keyboard shortcut . also maybe just add a break before the non-collapsed button be enough . the downside to more wrapping   be that on smaller screen there be more real estate take up   and the wrapping start to look random ( long   short   long short etc ) . )

text: filter_glossary have the potential to be slow on large site
column3: NNP VBZ DT JJ TO VB JJ IN JJ NNS
column4: ROOT nsubj det obj mark cop ccomp case amod obl
column5: as a follow - on to mdl - 43524 which remove global text caching   we need to examine the glossary filter and probably add MUC cache there to improve performance . the glossary filter be what put link in text to glossary entry . there be quite a lot of processing go on in the background even before the simple text replacement   and this need to be redo every time the cache be invalidate . Petr have raise that the fully correct way would be to use new event or the as - yet - unwritten hook to invalidate the cache   but I think that might be too much to do before 2.7   so I want to see a quick solution here even if it may mean rely on less - perfect cache invalidation . this issue require performance comparison test before and after the fix .

text: remove duplicate in YUI rollup
column3: VB NNS IN NNP NN
column4: ROOT obj case compound nmod
column5: when we convert from SimpleYUI   I must have make a transposition error . we include the same module twice in slightly different rollup . the first be never use as a result . the duplicate I have remove be : * yui - base ; * get ; * feature ; * loader - base ; * loader - rollup ; and * loader - yui3 . these contain all of the metadata for Moodle   the loader itself   and the fetch mechanism . if they be break in some other way   we would see a very large bang and no work Javascript within Moodle . to clarify   these be already include by we use yui which be a rollup of the above 6 module . file - size savings : | | | | content size | | gzipp size | | | | before | 388kb | 112kb | | | after | 289kb | 86.6 kb |

I go for option 2 . if the show group count < = number of group + 1   then we should not show the plugin imo . I have go for the group +1 option because there be a strong chance that the plugin will be in a group of it be own and will thus take up a whole slot . it should also not be display if it will not be visible by default .

text: per - request temp directory
column3: IN HYPH NN NN NNS
column4: ROOT case punct compound compound
column5: accord to [ the doc | http docs.moodle.org dev server_clustering_improvements_proposal # .24 CFG - .3 Etempdir ] : if any script try to use temp file that be not create during current request it be a bug that need to be fix . now in load balanced environment ( without sticky session ) with multiple web server and local temp dir define on the web server local file system   there be at least two case where file be use for more than the current request : - upload user via CSV - restore course backup try to perform the above action lead to error and the inability to complete the action unless the local tempidr $ cfg - > tempdir be remove from the configuration   lose the local tempdir functionality . this issue introduce a new function : { code } make_request_directory ( $ exceptiononerror = true ) ; { code } this can be use in the same way as make_temp_directory ( )   but it do * not * take a subdirectory as a argument . it always output the full path to the new directory   and ensure that it will be delete after the request finish .

column5: the set Export new or update grade only in the gradebook export xml format be only handle in the preview   not in the file . * to reproduce : * # go to the gradebook in a course with some graded activity # be sure to have a id for each activity and for the course category in the gradebook # in the export section   select the xml format # be sure to select Export new or update grade only # click Submit # the preview will only show the new or update grade as expect # click download _ expected result : _ the export file should only contain new or update grade . _ actual result : _ the file will include all grade   not only the new or update grade   which be wrong .

column5: it be discuss in Scrum and we be not yet happy with the table editing control in Atto . we will probably move to a more comprehensive table edit dialogue in the future - but it be too late to start work on that for 2.7 - in the meantime there be 2 improvement that can be make to the context menu that will make it much nicer to use . 1 . - add a option to add remove the caption for a table - 2 . - hide option that don t make sense when the menu open ( e.g . add caption to a table with a caption   move the left column to the left ) - when I implement this issue and test it it still be confuse to use so I go further . I make the entry in the context menu hide when they didn t make sense for the select cell - and add a edit table entry that open a window to edit the caption and change the header for the table .

text: weight default to zero in Weighted Mean of Grades Aggregation Method
column3: NN NNS IN CD IN NNP NNP IN NNPS NNP NNP
column4: ROOT compound case nmod case compound nmod case compound compound nmod
column5: when add new assignment to new course   weight of grade in gradebook default to zero with the weighted mean of grade aggregation method in certain situation . if new assignment be add   and gradebook have be set to simple Weighted Mean then switch to desire Weighted Mean of Grades aggregation   default weight will show up as 1.0 as be intend . however   once grade aggregation have be switch to Weighted Mean of Grades   subsequent assignment add will have a default weight of 0 in the gradebook instead of intend 1.0 . step to reproduce : 1 . add new course and save . 2 . go to new course main page   click turn on editing 3 . go to first available week   click add a activity or resource 4 . click assignment and add 5 . name assignment   add description   click Save and Return to Course 6 . click Course Administration < Grades < category and item 7 . click full view option 8 . Notice Aggregation be set at default to simple weighted mean of grade 9 . select drop down menu for aggregation   change to weighted mean of grade 11 . save change 12 . notice weight default show up as 1.0 as intend . 13 . return to you course   and add new assignment with same step detail above within same week or in new week . 14 . save and return to course 15 . click Course Administration < Grades < category and item 16 . click full view 17 . Notice Aggregation be set to Weighted mean of grade as this setting be earlier change and save . 18 . notice default weight of most recently add assignment be now show as 0   when it should be 1.0

text: bad rtl filepicker style
column3: JJ NN NN NNS
column4: ROOT amod compound compound
column5: a few css style in the filepicker only look good on ltr   or at the very least don t consider RTL circumstance . * 2.5.x : * _ theme base filemanager.css _ * line 72   { { . fp - toolbar div } } padding - right rule ** apply erroneously under RTL * line 72   { { . dir - rtl . fp - toolbar div } } width : 100px rule ** this rule come in with mdl - 32479 and seem like a really   really bad idea ( see http tracker.moodle.org secure attachment 37967 private % 20files % 20rtl.png ) * line 74   { { . fp - toolbar img } } margin - right rule ** apply erroneously under RTL * line 79   { { . fp - viewbar } } style definition include a 8px margin - right under ltr ( recent file ltr.png ) ** not a problem under RTL since in that circumstance the element in question float leave ; this rule should be remove ** need a text - align rule ( and a RTL rule to match ) because the viewbar be actually narrower than 72px ; it take up 72px   but due to negative margin actually appear smaller . * line 81   { { . dir - rtl . fp - viewbar } } definition include a explicit width declaration @ 100px ( private file rtl.png ) ** 72px be enough and we need horizontal space for Alfresco s selectbox ( see mdl - 36836 ) * 2.6.x : * ( http tracker.moodle.org secure attachment 37975 26 % 20private % 20files.png ) _ theme base filemanager.css _ * line 73   { { . file - picker . fp - toolbar div   . fp - navbar . filemanager - toolbar . fp - toolbar div } } margin rule ** no matching rtl definition * line 89   { { . dir - rtl . file - picker . fp - viewbar } } margin - leave : 0 rule ** erroneous - put the viewbar right up against the border

text: pdf annotation remain after pdf be replace
column3: NN NNS VBP IN NN VBZ VBN
column4: ROOT compound nsubj mark nsubj:pass aux:pass advcl
column5: when a student edit a assignment submission and delete a pdf that be already annotate by the teacher and then add a new pdf submission   the annotation give by the teacher for the old pdf remain in the new pdf . step to reproduce : # in any course   create a assignment that allow file submission . # as a student   submit a pdf file for the assignment . # as a teacher   annotate the student s pdf submission and save . # as the student   return to the assignment and click edit submission . # delete the exist pdf file and upload a new pdf file . save change . # as the teacher   access assignment and click View grade all submission . # click Grade icon under Grade column for the same student . # launch pdf editor and observe expect result : annotation from the old pdf file should not display in the new pdf submission . actual result : annotation from the old pdf file be retain and display in the newly submit pdf file .

Mark s : http github.com markn86 moodle compare master ... mdl - 45594_master Tim s : http github.com markn86 moodle compare master ... mdl - 45594_master_alt -- -- - see mdl - 35453 . problem line of code : { noformat } message lib.php ( 3 match ) 715 : select mr1.useridto as userid   MAX ( mr1.id ) as mid 721 : select mr2.useridfrom as userid   MAX ( mr2.id ) as mid 732 : order by mr.id desc ; 741 : select m1.useridto as userid   MAX ( m1.id ) as mid 747 : select m2.useridfrom as userid   MAX ( m2.id ) as mid 758 : order by m.id desc ; 799 : order by mr.id desc ; order by id should give the same result as order by timecreate but will be faster { noformat }

column6: both quiz autosave code mod quiz yui src autosave j autosave.js   and lib yui src formchangechecker j formchangechecker.js require special code to work with TinyMCE . it seem that it they will alos need special code to work with atto   but no - one have write that . to reproduce ( quiz ) # ( Optional ) add $ cfg - > forced_plugin_settings = array ( quiz = > array ( autosaveperiod = > 3 ) ) ; to you config.php to make the easier to test . ( just a 3 second delay between a change and a auto - save . ) # ensure you have a default set - up use atto   not TinyMCE or another editor . # create a quiz contain one essay question   that use the html editor with file picker response type . # attempt the quiz   and open the console . ( the autosave code output useful debug message to tell you what be go on - assume you have developer debug on . ) # type something in Atto   and verify that 3 seconds later ( or whatever delay you set ) a autosave ajax request happen . # add a image to atto use the filepicker   and verify that cause a autosave too . to reproduce ( Formchangechecker ) # go to a form   and click to make a new post . # type a x in the message box . # click the back button . you should get a warning that you be about to leave a page with unsaved datum   but you don t .

text: decide and document output component
column3: VB CC VB NN NNS
column4: ROOT cc conj compound obj
column5: this be a essential part of the task - unfortunately the approach be broad and what we choose now we have to commit to and live with . it have to meet we need now and in the future . some of the thing that need to factor into this decision be : * element and component re-use * re-use be key to this approach . we want to have component contain existing element and component   and when we want to change how a element look we want that change reflect in all use of the element within other component that don t require it to look different . this way you can style a button and instantly have the look update across other component like search form contain button . * element and component can be complex * element don t need to be easy to write - they should be feature full and limited in number . Developers should not write component instead they should be re-use the available element and component . * overriding a render to change how a element must be both easy and robust * re-use be key as per the above point . however we need to achieve this in such a way that we don t introduce magic and keep thing simple to understand and override . we have to be able to deal with state and attribute requirement of the element in relation to its parent component and do it in such as way that the state be own by the component and attribute be owner by the render method . and keep it all understandable .

text: develop a user menu
column3: VBG DT NN NN
column4: ROOT det compound obj
column5: add a user menu   in the bootstrapbase theme ; refer to the specification to know what it should contain   and how to implement it . the general approach here be to refactor the exist navbar s capability   allow it to support multiple dropdown without adversely affect exist DOM structure ( which would necessitate every theme re-target its style ) . update 10 06 2014 : the user menu be be render fine   but the current solution doesn t quite encapsulate everything that will need to happen with the navbar ; in particular   page_heading_menu ( ) stuff isn t handle by this solution as it doesn t really make sense for that stuff to live in a dropdown . update 24 06 2014 : okay   this turn out to be huge . - the new { { user_menu } } renderable be a extension of the { { custom_menu } } renderable   construct with reference to a user   a course   a page and a array of flag ( at present   the only thing that make sense to set _ a priori _ be { { guest } }   a boolean flag ) . -- base the new renderable on the { { custom_menu } } allow for it to be easily display in base - base theme as well . -- a minor bug in { { custom_menu } } s yui3 dropdown code be fix : in brief   the logic be look for a dropdown attribute on the node that be click ( e.target ) instead of the node that the event be actually wire to ( e.currenttarget ) . - { { custom_menu } } renderable have be extend by way of mdl - 46022 and have also gain the ability to assign css suffix flag to { { custom_menu_item } } s - which be necessary for we to avoid have to hardcode icon into the renderer php . - in order to support multiple collapsible menu   it be necessary to create a entire { { bootstrap_navbar } } renderable which render the { { body > header } } element and render out a collection of menu . bootstrap javascript have be patch to allow for multiple navbar item . - responsive style have be provide .

text: slow behat test for backup
column3: JJ NN NNS IN NN
column4: ROOT amod compound case nmod
column5: when we run behat backup test   we pass a table such as : { code } when I backup Course 2 course use this option : | Filename | test_backup . mbz | | setting_section_section_2_userinfo | 0 | | setting_section_section_2_included | 0 | | setting_section_section_4_userinfo | 0 | | setting_section_section_4_included | 0 | { code } we then call i_backup_course_using_this_options   pass in those option . that in turn handle the backup process look at each page . at each page   it use the follow to fill in the form : { code } $ this - > fill_backup_restore_form ( $ option ) ; { code } which then look for each option in the table and fill it in . since most of those setting be only find on one page   we then wait 12 seconds for the search for that option to fail to be find ( which we ignore with a try catch ) . http github.com moodle moodle blob master backup util ui test behat behat_backup.php # l351 the result be that each test involve backup take a good minute just to fill in the each page of the backup form   for three page make about 3 minute of waste time in timeout . by fix this   we should be able to knock a good few minute off behat runtime .

column5: I be read through the Shibboleth code and find this in auth shibboleth index.php near line 37 { code } if we can find the shibboleth attribute   save it in session and return to main login page if ( ! empty ( $ _ server [ $ pluginconfig - > user_attribute ] ) ) { Shibboleth auto - login $ frm = new stdclass ( ) ; $ frm - > username = strtolower ( $ _ server [ $ pluginconfig - > user_attribute ] ) ; $ frm - > password = substr ( base64_encode ( $ _ server [ $ pluginconfig - > user_attribute ] )  0 8 ) ; the random password consist of the first 8 letter of the base 64 encode user id this password be never use unless the user account be convert to manual { code } the problem be that I don t believe base64 be random at all and for short username could yield extremely short password . for instance the first 8 character of the username ted be dgvk . I be certainly no security expert but if a site for whatever reason decide to stop use Shibboleth anyone could stick a bunch of know username through base64 and easily have the first 8 character . it seem like a bunch of randomized garbage character would be a better idea to use . I really hope I be miss something here .
