text: add extra credit   drop - low keep - high   accurate weight and contribution column to user report
column3: VB JJ NN
column4: VB HYPH RB VB HYPH RB
column5: JJ NNS CC NN NN IN NN NN
column6: ROOT amod obj punct dep punct advmod dep punct advmod punct amod obj cc compound conj case compound obl
column7: # calculate up each container ‚Äô s ( category or course item ) adjust weight percentage and grademax associate with the item adjust ( need this for weighting   so could be do here or after the next step ) # calculate point ( must be first   you can not calculate weight until you have the finalgrade and grademax for category ) . for each gtree - > level start with highest ( item ) to lowest ( course ) for both finalgrade and grademax # # include hide only if hidetotalsifcontainhiddenitem be set to GRADE_REPORT_SHOW_REAL_TOTAL_IF_CONTAINS_HIDDEN # # ignore ungraded item if aggregateonlygrade be set   do not apply when calculate total point for setup ( category and item ) screen # # include extra credit item in finalgrade calculation only   not grademax # # ignore item that have be drop from drop low or keep high # # accumulate all other finalgrade and grademax into parent category finalgrade and grademax # calculate weight ( must be do before calculate contribution ) . for each gtree - > level start with highest ( item ) to lowest ( course ) # # weight be always percentage grade * weight ... in this case PERCENTAGE : [ item grademax ( container grademax - adjust grademax for the container from step 1 ) ] * weight : [ ( 100 - adjust weight for the container from step 1 ) ] # adjust weight in a container to always equal 100 # calculate contribution ( need in order to accurately drop lowest   keep highest . also need to provide the most percentage ) . for each gtree - > level start with highest ( item ) to lowest ( course ) # # contribution be always the item ‚Äô s percentage * the item ‚Äô s weight * the container ‚Äô s weight ‚Ä¶ so ( finalgrade grademax ) * item weight * container weight # limit category - drop lowest   keep highest ( need to have contribution in order to accurately drop low and keep high ) # # remove contrib # # remove finalgrade from parent finalgrade # # remove maxgrade from parent maxgrade

text: use cohort to restrict display of course category and set theme
column3: VB NNS TO VB NN IN NN NNS CC VBD NNS
column4: ROOT obj mark xcomp obj case compound nmod cc conj obj
column5: problem : some Moodle user   such as large organisation with many department   would like to have one Moodle but set it up so that each user only see the course from they own department   and with a theme that match they department . a simple solution : use cohort to represent the department   and allow each cohort to be map to one course category and one theme . then   once a user have log in   we know which cohort they be in   and this which category they be allow in   and then we restrict the entire course tree to just show those category ( and anything inside they ) . if there be just one category then we could further refine this by leave out the name of the category and put the contents of it at the top level . there don t have to be any further change in enrolment   and if the user be also enrol in any course outside this category then these course will simply appear in the list of my course at the top level . additionally   if they be in just one cohort ( or all they cohort have the same theme ) we also set the theme to match ( this cohort theme set override all other theme setting ) . ( thanks to Andrea Bicciolo at Mediatouch for the idea - he estimate it would be suitable for 80 % of he client who want multi-tenancy in Moodle )

text: improve behaviour of grader header   footer and sidebar on iOS 8 + IE
column3: VB NN IN NN NN
column4: NN CC NN IN NNP CD SYM NNP
column5: ROOT obj case compound nmod punct conj cc conj case obl nummod dep dep
column6: this issue relate to jankiness of the grader report on IE and iOS 8 beta 4 ( Safari ) . in iOS version < 8   the scroll event be only fire at the end of the action   and not throughout so this be not a issue . from iOS 8 ( test with beta 4 on Safari )   the scroll event be fire throughout . however   it be not fire frequently enough   result in a stutter feeling . IE just suck at table and with a large table in the DOM   it stutter without any javascript at all . add the float header make this more apparent for the same reason that iOS 8 appear to stutter - the scroll event be not call frequently enough   and it look like it be stutter as a result . we have try several fix for this already   and at present the code be highly optimised so that the fewest number of calculation occur . the code also batch ui change to reduce layout thrash . in one sense   it would be nice to use a position of fix   but this have it be own issue too : * iOS have a long - standing know issue where fix item gradually disappear off the screen . as far as I can tell   there be no known fix for the iOS fix issue   so to keep it from disappear off screen   we would have to maintain the current solution of relative positioned element . maintain two method for this be not a ideal situation - especially just for a single ecosystem .

column5: it be consider acceptable that the natural weighting aggregation method would replace the Sum of grade aggregation   rather than be a additional   new aggregation method . the upgrade path to achieve this replacement be clear . a number of name suggestion be the new aggregation method   include : * natural weighted   * default   * simple   * Easy   * Standard and * Natural . it be accept by consensus that Natural concisely represent the meaning of the aggregation method and would also be consistent if it be adopt as the new default method   potentially the only default method selectable on new site .

column5: the current grade export feature do not have a way to filter the result by date . while work on mdl - 46599 we find the necessity of create a new filter by date and time   in order to fix this bug properly . the main concept be allow user to export grade from a past date to now   and save the last export date for further reference . another benefit of this new feature would be standardize all export format ( OpenDocument   Plain text   Excel and xml ) . we be still consider about the possibility of replace the * export new or update grade only * by this date filter . however this could turn this issue too expensive because the xml structure be different of other export format and be be use by OU and it rely on a config : * gradeexport * .

text: investigate fix handling of hide and exclude grade within natural weight
column3: VB NN NN IN VBN CC VBN NNS IN JJ NNS
column4: ROOT compound obj case amod cc conj nmod case amod obl
column5: simple description of this issue : make natural weighting compatible with exclude grade ( either exclude by exclude empty grade   or manually exclude grade ) . what need to happen for this to work : the automatic weight for each grade_item natural weighting will need to be adjust per user depend on the grade that be exclude . the max grade for the category will need to be different per user depend on the grade that be exclude . very simple example : | | Grade item | | Max grade | | Natural Weight | | | assign 1 | 10 | 10 % | | assign 2 | 20 | 20 % | | assign 3 | 30 | 30 % | | assign 4 | 40 | 40 % | total = 100 if item 2 be exclude because the student have not submit anything and exclude empty grade be enable - | | Grade item | | Max grade | | Natural Weight | | | assign 1 | 10 | 12.5 % | | assign 3 | 30 | 37.5 % | | assign 4 | 40 | 50 % | total = 80 further more - currently we recalculate the view if show total exclude hidden item be enable . depend on the performance of recalculate all of the above at page load time - we may need to add additional column to store the view for user without view hide grade capability . ( this would be 3 extra column on grade_grade ) older - more complicated description : at the moment   exclude and empty grade not be calculate in the final grade   be not enable with sum of grade ( the basis of natural weight ) . also currently we have not introduce code to handle display hidden grade in the report . to do : # update report to not consider empty grade . this work will be partially solve by mdl - 47078 . # update report to exclude hidden grade item . please note that hidden grade item be item hide to all student and doesn t cover conditional access to activity . example : ( please note that this be the desire outcome ) * exclude empty grade * student 1 | | Grade item | | Grade | | percent | | | assign 1 | 10 20 | 50 % | | assign 2 | 10 40 | 5 % | | assign 3 | - 80 | - | | total | 20 60 | 33.33 % | student 2 | | Grade item | | Grade | | percent | | | assign 1 | - 20 | - | | assign 2 | - 40 | - | | assign 3 | 20 80 | 25 % | | total | 20 80 | 25.00 % | student 1 20 ( 33.00 % ) student 2 20 ( 25.00 % ) * exclude hidden grade item * student 1 | | Grade item | | Grade | | percent | | | assign 1 | 10 20 | 50 % | | assign 2 - hide | - 40 | - | | assign 3 | 40 80 | 50 % | | total | 50 100 | 50.00 % | student 2 | | Grade item | | Grade | | percent | | | assign 1 | 15 20 | 75 % | | assign 2 - hide | - 40 | - | | assign 3 | 20 80 | 25 % | | total | 35 100 | 35.00 % | student 1 20 ( 50.00 % ) student 2 20 ( 35.00 % ) * additional technical information : * http tracker.moodle.org browse mdl - 46139 introduce a field   grade_grade : : aggregationweight that may be helpful . currently   grade_category : : auto_update_weights ( ) adjust grade_item weight but do this trickle down to grade_grades ? if a individual student can not see a activity be zero grade_grade : : aggregationweight and recalculate the weight in that category for that student sufficient ? this code may want to live in get_hiding_affected ( ) in grade_grade.php .

text: natural aggregation normalize value to the range mingrade - > maxgrade - it should use 0 - > maxgrade
column3: JJ NN VBZ NNS IN DT NN VBN HYPH SYM JJ HYPH PRP MD VB CD HYPH SYM JJ
column4: ROOT amod nsubj obj case det obl acl punct dep dep punct nsubj aux parataxis dep punct dep ccomp
column5: while this behaviour be logical - it be different to the old behaviour - and since nothing in the spec say to change it - we need to update the code to work like sum of grade use to and write a behat test to lock it in . quick explanation of what should happen : manual grade item with a min grade of 10 and a max grade of 20 if I get 15 for this item - 20 should be add to the category grademax and 15 add to the total ( assume automatic weight ) . manual grade item with a min grade of -10 and a max grade of 20 if I get 15 for this item - 20 should be add to the category grademax and 15 add to the total ( assume automatic weight ) . a scale should use the value 0 - number item in the scale . the first item in the scale get a grade of 1   0 be for item set to no grade

column5: we will create a universal block for CBE related content and information   typically use on the dashboard it will not be limit to there . the block will display : # plan # - current active learning plan # - progression of current plan # - link to all learning plan # user competency to review # plan to review maybe at a later stage this block could also link to the mentee of the current user   as in the user in which the current user have a specific capability . the block will define its own page list the element cite above . for example   the user competency will be review directly from a block page   extend tool_lp template to avoid code duplication . in theory the block will only rely on the api method provide by tool_lp and not include any logic of its own .

text: create a new page that can migrate a set of course from one competency framework to another
column3: VB DT JJ NN WDT MD VB DT NN IN NNS IN CD NN NN IN DT
column4: ROOT det amod obj nsubj aux acl:relcl det obj case nmod case nummod compound nmod case obl
column5: the use case be for update to a newer curriculum   but leave already complete competency un-modified . the workflow would be to either duplicate the old framework and make change to it   or create a new one and import from file   then choose which course should be move to the new framework and trigger a script that will look for competency that exist in both framework ( match on idnumber ) and update the course activity competency to point to the new framework . this process should produce a report of competency that be map   competency that could not be map   as well as new competency that do not exist in the old framework . from the spec : a competency framework can be duplicate   and there be a admin tool for migrate course from one framework to another ( as long as the idnumber between the competency in the framework can be match ) .

text: a competency framework can customise the term for up to 4 competency level
column3: DT NN NN MD VB DT NNS IN RB IN CD NN NNS
column4: ROOT det compound nsubj aux det obj case advmod advmod nummod compound obl
column5: we will restrict the depth of the competency framework so that we can allow customisable language to describe each level of a competency . from the spec : the taxonomy refer to the naming for each level in the framework . up to 4 level be support   and the name for each level can be set from the following list : Domain   Competency   Behaviour   Indicator   Outcome   Level   Concept   Value   Practice   Skill   Proficiency these will be provide by language string   so they can be display in different language ( not take from user input ) . all other screen should replace the word competency and competency with the correct term depend on the depth of the competency . the number of term will be fetch from a method in the framework class   just to ensure that later on we can change this number   or make it match a configuration variable . the term level can either be save in 4 column   or in 1 column ( _ taxonomy _ ) with serialise datum . the serialise data be less flexible but it seem unlikely that we will need to fetch just 1 term   or filter per term without load the framework object . the term be use constant and will be map to language string   e.g . : { noformat } const taxonomy_domain = domain ; const taxonomy_competency = competency ; < lang_string > public function get_taxonomy ( $ level ) ; < lang_string > public static function get_taxonomy_for_term ( $ constant ) ; { noformat }

column5: this issue be about create the basic api create crud user competency . user competency be link between the user and a competency   often they will be transparently create from a user plan . this issue should not be create any external function or api yet as we will not even have a view   and also because the capability check be tricky in this case as the model be only use to store information at this stage . later on when we add competency review then we will have api and external function . the _ persistent _ model be the only thing we need . non-exhaustive list of column need : * int id * int userid * int competencyid * int status ( idle   in review   etc   will be define later ) ( use constant ) * int reviewerid * bool proficiency * int grade ( from a scale ) at this stage we will consider that the link competency can not be delete without delete the user_competency   therefore we do not need to duplicate the competency information like scale   etc ...

column5: we need to create a api that can be use to attach evidence to competency   or more precisely user competency . perhaps api : : create_evidence be all we need . at present I do not think we need to create a external function for a evidence as it be unlikely that a evidence will be add manually . most of the time the evidence will be add follow a event ( course completion   manual grading   evidence of prior learning link   ... ) . evidence should never be remove or update therefore we will not need other api function for now . note that a user_competency record must exist before a evidence can be attach to it therefore this issue will have to ensure that the record exist .

text: handle hidden template framework when link competency
column3: VB JJ NNS NNS WRB VBG NNS
column4: ROOT amod compound obj advmod amod advcl
column5: when a user be build a framework they can set they framework as hide   in which case it will not show up in the different area where a framework can be pick to then select some of its competency . the same apply to template   when the template be hide it can not be select to create a plan from that template . there be no security risk attach to this issue   which mean that the function list the framework and template use a optional argument to filter out the invisible template framework . everyone can list hidden framework template but the UI will only display the relevant one ( visible ) . craft a request will report the hidden framework template   and that be fine . however   the method that be link competency to a framework template should first check that the competency be not part of a hidden framework   in which case it can not be link . the method create a plan from a template will perform the same check to ensure that the template be visible . note that if a framework template be hide after the competency plan be create nothing happen . the hidden option be just there to act as a draft archive flag to only display the relevant option in the UI . if the competency plan be already create then it remain visible regardless of the status of its origin . at a later stage we may decide to rename _ visible _ to something more relevant . or to have a _ status _ on the framework template ( draft   active   archive ) . in that case a framework template would have to be make active to be visible in the relevant ui   and it could not be send back as draft when use . later maybe .

text: competency list in a complete plan must never change
column3: NNS VBN IN DT VBN NN MD RB VB
column4: ROOT nsubj csubj case det amod obl aux advmod
column5: when we get the competency of a _ complete _ learn plan   we need to get the list of competency from the archive we create when the plan be mark as complete . the reason for this be because while a plan can not be change once it be complete   a template could change and those change would be reflect in the plan . once a plan be complete it should be freeze . there be a few way to fix this : # unlink the plan from its template upon completion ( not recommend   heavy   relationship lose ) # copy the template_competencies to plan_competencies ( almost act unlink   heavy   add weird conditional getter in $ plan - > get_competencies ( ) # add a additional condition to $ plan - > get_competencies ( ) to generate the list of competency from the archive competency ( sortorder of competency be hard to figure out ) I have start a patch for this   but test fail because it break the archiving mechanism . { noformat } diff -- git a admin tool lp class plan.php b admin tool lp class plan.php index f55d4a7 . .3 d84889 100644 -- - a admin tool lp class plan.php + + + b admin tool lp class plan.php @ @ -121 13 +121 19 @ @ class plan extend persistent { * public function get_competencies ( ) { $ competency = array ( ) ; - if ( $ this - > get_templateid ( ) ) { + if ( $ this - > get_status ( ) == self : : STATUS_COMPLETE ) { + get the competency from the archive of the plan . + $ competency = user_competency_plan : : list_competencies ( $ this - > get_id ( )   $ this - > get_userid ( ) ) ; + + } else if ( $ this - > is_based_on_template ( ) ) { get the competency from the template . $ competency = template_competency : : list_competencies ( $ this - > get_templateid ( )   true ) ; + } else { get the competency from the plan . $ competency = plan_competency : : list_competencies ( $ this - > get_id ( ) ) ; } + return $ competency ; } diff -- git a admin tool lp class user_competency_plan.php b admin tool lp class user_competency_plan.php index f89ed1d . .8315 a69 100644 -- - a admin tool lp class user_competency_plan.php + + + b admin tool lp class user_competency_plan.php @ @ -143 6 +143 38 @ @ class user_competency_plan extend persistent { } ** + * list the competency in this plan . + * + * @ param int $ planid the plan id + * @ param int $ userid the user id + * @ return competency [ ] + * + public static function list_competencies ( $ planid   $ userid ) { + global $ db ; + + todo fix ordering . the order set in template_competency   or plan_competency be not apply here . + perhaps we should have copy the sortorder here as well . + $ sql = select c. * + from { . competency : : table . } c + join { . self : : table . } ucp + on ucp.competencyid = c.id + and ucp.userid = : userid + where ucp.planid = : planid ; + $ params = array ( userid = > $ userid   planid = > $ planid ) ; + + todo mdl - 52229 handle hide competency . + $ result = $ db - > get_recordset_sql ( $ sql   $ params ) ; + + $ instance = array ( ) ; + foreach ( $ result as $ key = > $ result ) { + $ instance [ $ key ] = new competency ( 0   $ result ) ; + } + $ result - > close ( ) ; + + return $ instance ; + } + + ** * get multiple user_competency_plan for a user . * * @ param int $ userid the user id . { noformat } along with this   this issue should also ensure that a user can not : - remove a competency from a complete plan - add a new competency from a complete plan

column5: I use a moodle theme which be base on bootstrapbase . after upgrade the moodle from 2.9 to 3.0 - latest   the dropdown menu can not be show correctly . compare with 2.9   I find the 3.0 miss one css style which be define in theme bootstrapbase style moodle.css : @ media ( min - width : { color : red } 980px { color } ) { . nav - collapse.collapse { height : auto ! important ; overflow : visible ! important } } in 3.0 it change to : @ media ( min - width : { color : red } 979px + 1 { color } ) { . nav - collapse.collapse { height : auto ! important ; overflow : visible ! important } } it be generate from theme bootstrapbase less bootstrap responsive - navbar.less   in which the variable @ navbarCollapseDesktopWidth be refer . and the @ navbarCollapseDesktopWidth be define in theme bootstrapbase less bootstrap variables.less   like : @ navbarCollapseWidth : 979px ; @ navbarCollapseDesktopWidth : @ navbarcollapsewidth + 1 ; the solution be add parenthesis for @ navbarCollapseDesktopWidth in theme bootstrapbase less bootstrap responsive - navbar.less   like : @ media ( min - width : ( @ navbarCollapseDesktopWidth ) ) { then generate the moodle.css file again by use : grunt css .

column5: it have occur that we need to store the suggestion that be apply in a course . simply rely on the _ evidence _ will make it hard to compute datum for that course only   join   etc ... so we will introduce a new model _ user_competency_course _ which store the proficiency and rating of a user in the context of a course . so   when a teacher be suggest a rate from a course we will populate the table _ user_competency_course _ and attach a evidence as we be currently do . when a suggestion happen within a activity ( e.g . trigger by auto completion ) we will also record that at the course level . when the suggestion be in a context parent to a course we proceed as normal . mdl - 52979 will take care of display the information in the view . at a later stage we may decide to rephrase Suggest if another word work better .

text: recycle bin - delete large complex object force user to wait
column3: VB NN HYPH VBG JJ JJ NNS NNS NN TO VB
column4: ROOT obl punct amod amod amod compound compound obj mark xcomp
column5: with the recycle bin enable   delete large   complex object force the user to wait until the backup process have complete before they can do anything else . when you delete small object ( e.g.   label   simple page )   the deletion occur quickly . by deletion   I mean this workflow : 1 . turn editing on 2 . delete item 3 . turn edit off but when you delete a larger   complex object   step 3 above -- turn edit off -- can take a long time ( up to > 2 minute )   and there be no indication ( other than what the browser provide ) that something be happen . you basically have to wait for it to finish . something that use to happen immediately -- turn edit off after delete something ( regardless of its complexity ) -- can take minute with the Recycle Bin enable . a example of a large   complex object be a quiz with 95 question and 155 student response . obviously   Moodle be work on back up the quiz   and since it be rather complex ( lot of response )   it take time . the same thing happen on restore . restore this kind of quiz can take some time   but there isn t any kind of progress indicator to let the user know that something be happen and that it may take some time . the concern here be that with the recycle bin enable   a fundamental aspect of the moodle experience have change ; i.e.   delete some object no longer happen quickly if they be complex . how long it take for Moodle to return control when turn editing back off after delete a object depend on how large complex that object be . and Moodle provide no progress indicator that something be happen . we also see this behavior when test the recycle bin plugin we moodle 2.7 site ( we also see session lock error for large object deletion ) . we also see this issue on a test moodle 3.1 server with the recycle bin enable . while this quiz example may represent a outlier   user delete all sort of thing ... small and large object .

text: html audio tag remove from forum post
column3: NN NN NN VBN IN NN NN
column4: ROOT compound compound nsubj case compound obl
column5: a user wish to embed a . wav file into a forum post . add the . wav file via the text editor s media button only insert a hyperlink to the file ( see mdl - 54846 ) . use the text editor s source mode   the user attempt to embed the upload . wav file use the html 5 audio tag . however   upon save   the audio tag be automatically remove so the file be not embed . use the same code in a page resource   the audio tag be not remove . * step to replicate * 1 . create a forum activity . 2 . add a new post to the forum . 3 . click the media button on the text editor . 4 . upload a . wav file and then click the insert media button . the . wav file be add to the page as a hyperlink . 5 . click the html button on the text editor to switch into source mode . 6 . update the html use the html 5 audio tag to embed the . wav file into the page . same code : { noformat } < p > the wav file should be embed . < p > < audio control > < source src = http core2next-sandbox.mrooms.net draftfile.php 612 user draft 162587154 a2002011001-e02.wav type = audio wav > you browser do not support the audio element . < audio > { noformat } 7 . submit the post . 8 . read the post . also edit the post and click the html button on the text editor . observe behavior : the . wav file be not embed in the html . the audio tag have be remove . the result html : { noformat } < p > the wav file should be embed . < p > you browser do not support the audio element . { noformat } expect behavior : the audio tag be retain in the html . the . wav file be embed into the forum post allow the audio file to be play directly from the post . * replication location * behavior have be replicate in 3.0.4 and 2.9.3 . * additional investigation note * 1 . the audio tag be remove from the forum post html regardless of the file type be embed . for example   attempt to embed a . mp3 file with the audio tag also result in the audio tag be remove . 2 . behavior be replicate with both the Atto and TinyMCE text editor . * user impact * a instructor teach a sound design course would like for student to be able to share they . wav file within forum . the . wav file format be not among the file format currently handle by Moodle s media embedding feature ( see mdl - 54846 ) . a potential work - around would be manually enter the necessary html to embed the file   but this can not be do when the audio tag be automatically remove .

text: render concurrent mustache template with string lose javascript
column3: VBG JJ NN NNS IN NNS VBZ NN
column4: ROOT amod amod compound nsubj case nmod obj
column5: use client - side rendering of multiple template at once can cause any { { # j } } block in those template to be lose   if the template need to fetch language string from the server . this be because there be a single share template module with global state contain the require javascript addition   and it be reset on every call to render ( ) . * to reproduce : * * create a plugin in { { local } } call mustacheproblem . * create a template call { { problem.mustache } } { code : html } { { ! @ template local_mustacheproblems problem Example context ( json ) : { } } } < div > this be a template whose { { # str } } javascript   local_mustacheproblems { { str } } < span id = some - span - { { uniqid } } > have not be run < span > < div > { { # j } } require ( [ jquery ]   function ( $ ) { $ ( # some - span - { { uniqid } } ) . html ( have be run ) ; } ) { { j } } { code } * create a second template call { { problems.mustache } } { code : html } { { ! @ template local_mustacheproblems problem example context ( json ) : { } } } < div id = problem - { { uniqid } } > < div > { { # j } } require ( [ jquery   core template ]   function ( $   template ) { for ( var i = 0 ; i < 5 ; i + + ) { var promise = templates.render ( local_mustacheproblems problem   { } ) ; promise.done ( function ( html   j ) { $ ( # problem - { { uniqid } } ) . append ( html ) ; templates.runtemplatejs ( j ) ; } ) ; } } ) ; { { j } } { code } * add the follow string to the { { lang en local_mustacheproblems.php } } { code : php } $ string [ pluginname ] = mustache problem ; $ string [ javascript ] = Javascript ; { code } * view local_mustacheproblems problem in the Template Library * expect result : * all five div should read Javascript have be run * actual result : * only the last div read Javascript have be run . if you select the template again   then with the required language string cache   all five div read Javascript have be run . * Notes : * I have mark this as 2.9.6 because that be the only system I have test it on   however look at the code for master show that the bug be still present .

text: create a script to compare all grade for a 57 % letter boundary problem .
column3: VB DT NN TO VB DT NNS IN DT CD NN NN NN NN .
column4: ROOT det obj mark xcomp det obj case det nummod compound compound compound obl punct
column5: currently the upgrade step for check if a course should be freeze with a 57 % letter boundary problem only check if the course have the potential that grade will be affect . it do not check individual grade to see if they be affect . it be quite possible that course will be flag as freeze when they do not need to be . this task be to create a script that can be use to check each grade and ensure that the course will only be freeze if there will definitely be a grade change .
